[\[249a.6\]]'on te bzlog pa'i bye brag gis/_/cha shas rtog par byed na yang /_/brtags pa yin phyir 'dra ba ni/_/gnas pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/_/thams cad du yang bdag rtogs pa'i/_/de yi rnam pa myong ba'i phyir/_/'dra ba yod kyang phyi rol la/_/shes pa [#]so sor myong ba med/_/mi 'dzin
[\[249a.7\]]pa yi dus na ni/_/yul 'di yod pa ma yin no/_/mnyam pa'i dus na rgyu min phyir/_/rgyu ma yin dang yul yang min/_/gnas pa yin du zin na yang /_/rnam pa gnyis pa myong ba med/_/myong ba yod par gyur na yang /_/de la brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs/_/'dra ba de myong gang
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]yin pa/_/de nyid phyi rol myong ba yang /_/nye bar brtags pa yin pa'i phyir/_/de ni yang dag nyid ma yin/_/nye bar brtags pa tsam gyis ni/_/don byed 'dod pa'i grub [#]pa med/_/bram ze'i bu la me btags pas/_/'di ltar 'tshed la sbyor ba med/_/don ni yongs su ma mthong phyir/_/_
[\[249b.2\]]de dang 'dra bar 'grub pa med/_/byed rgyu yin na'ang 'bras bu la/_/'dra ba bskyed pa'i ma yin te/_/gzugs snang ba yi rnam shes kyi/_/'on te sgra rig byung ba dang /_/sngon po la sogs snang ba na/_/mig la sogs pas ma nges 'gyur/_/rnam par dag las don grub [#]pa/_/de ni rjes su
[\[249b.3\]]dpag yin na/_/rmi lam la sogs 'khrul pa'i phyir/_/don gyis de la khyab pa'ang med/_/gzhan du dbang po drug po dag_/tshad ma so sor 'gog phyir dang /_/shin tu chung ba'i gzugs sogs kyis/_/sngon po la sogs ma grub phyir/_/mig gi rnam shes ldan pa yis/_/sngon
[\[249b.4\]]po shes kyi sngon po'i ming /_/shes pa min zhes gsungs pa gang /_/da ni tha snyad brten pa yin/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams/_/yang dag min zhes ngas bshad pas/_/sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/tha snyad du ni bstan pa yin/_/snang bas stong pa'i shes
[\[249b.5\]]pas kyang /_/gzhan rig pa ni rigs pa min/_/de ni khyad par med pa'i phyir/_/don ni nges pa med par 'gyur/_/gang phyir nye ba tsam dag gis/_/gzhan rig de ru 'gyur na ni/_/de ni kun la 'dra ba'i phyir/_/thams cad rig par cis [#]mi 'gyur/_/thams cad don kun mthong
[\[249b.6\]]'gyur te/_/'di ltar sna tshogs blo ldan gyis/_/yul du gzugs la sogs pa rnams/_/bye brag med phyir cis mi 'gyur/_/'on te yang ni yul 'ga' yis/_/blo dag shin tu bskyed byas nas/_/yod ces khas len byed na ni/_/'dra ba slar yang 'ongs pa yin/_/rtogs pa'i
[\[249b.7\]]ngo bo tha dad med/_/'dra ba dag las gzhan ci yod/_/shes pa gang yin rtogs yin na/_/de la'ang nyes pa gong du bstan/_/nges 'byung bye brag yod na yang /_/ma yin dbang po'ang de dang 'dra/_/shes pa'i dus na 'di med na/_/rgyu las ji ltar rab tu myong /_/tshogs pa
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]gcig la rag las nyid/_/ji ste bye brag rtogs byed na/_/sems dang sems byung tshogs pa yi/_/mig la sogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/tshogs pa gcig la'ang rag las kyang /_/dbang po la sogs rtogs med de/_/yul ma yin phyir zhe na yang /_/_
[\[250a.2\]]de 'dir spyod [#]phyir mi rung ngo /_/yul nyid yin pa grub na ni/_/lan 'di rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir/_/de nyid ma grub brjod pa yin/_/rtogs bya dang ni yul gnyis la/_/bye brag 'ga' yang yod min te/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed 'gog de
[\[250a.3\]]gnyis/_/de phyir bye brag yod pa min/_/gang phyir yul min de bas ni[#]/_/'di ni yul du mi 'gyur zhes/_/dngos po rnam par dag pa yi/_/smra ba shes pa gzhan su yod/_/gzhan du snang ba'i shes pa yis[#]/_/'dzin par rigs pa ma yin te/_/de lta yin na yul gyi
[\[250a.4\]]phyir/_/shes pa nges par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngo sogs ngo bo snang ba yi/_/yul du sgra la sogs gyur te/_/thams cad kyis ni yul thams cad/_/rnam par shes par thal bar 'gyur/_/dngos su gzhan gyi ngo bo la/_/mngon sum so sor myong med na/_/de dang mtshan nyid
[\[250a.5\]]mi mthun snang /_/de shes par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/yul gyi ched du dus kun du/_/'dir yang phan pa mi byed de/_/mi snang ba dang gzhan du snang /_/phyogs gnyis snga ma bzhin du mtshungs/_/cung zad byed pa med na yang /_/'dzin par rtog pa rigs pa min/_/gzhan la dngos
[\[250a.6\]]kyis [#]stong na ni/_/brjod pa 'thad pa ma yin no/_/des dben de yi rnam pa yi/_/mngon sum gnyis kyis rgyu 'bras kyi/_/dngos po rnam par nges pa 'di/_/de phyir yang dag nyid ma yin/_/'di ni 'di las 'byung ngo zhes/_/gnag rdzi yan chad ji ltar 'gyur/_/grags yin na'ang
[\[250a.7\]]yin du zad/_/grags pa de dag gsal ba med/_/de 'dod rnams la skabs 'dir ni/_/yang dag ched du dpyad pa byed/_/ji ste grags pa 'gog byed na/_/rnam par dpyad pa rgyun chad 'gyur/_/gang dag grags pa'i dngos po la/_/'gog par byed pa rab tu glen/_/de dag
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rnams kyis nges 'gal 'gyur/_/zla ba ri bong can 'gog bzhin/_/grags pa 'di ci 'dren [#]pa'am/_/bden pa min zhes nges bya'i [#]phyir/_/[#]rab tu grags pa tsam gyis ni/_/yang dag min zhes nye bar bsgrubs/_/brdzun pa'am [#]rmi lam la sogs na/_/'byung ba 'di dag
[\[250b.2\]]yongs su nges/_/bden pa nyid ni log na yang /_/gang tshe de ni mi ldog [#]pa/_/de tshe yang dag rnam dag pa/_/de yi [#]'gal bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon sum du/_/ji ste myong ba ma yin na/_/'di las 'di ni 'byung ngo zhes/_/ji ltar dran pa 'byung ba yin/_/_
[\[250b.3\]]rmi lam na yang brdzun pa yi/_/'bras bu la sogs dngos myong phyir/_/dran pa 'di ni de na snang /_/de las dngos po rnam nges med/_/'on te dran pa'i rtags dag las/_/rjes su myong ba rnams nges pa/_/spyir ni rab tu sgrub byed na/_/de tshe sgrub pa sgrub pa yin/_/'bras bu
[\[250b.4\]]la sogs don dam pa'i/_/yul ni rjes su myong bar yang /_/ji ste sgrub par byed 'dod na/_/rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/_/de nas de ni [#]grub pa med/_/snang bcas la sogs rnams shes kyis/_/don la 'dzin pa des bzlog pa/_/khyed kyis byas pa ma yin nam/_/grogs kyis
[\[250b.5\]]bstangs pas ngo bo 'phel/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni/_/rtag tu rnam shes bdag nyid nyid/_/bdag nyid rig pa'i ngo bo yi/_/mngon sum dag gis rnam par nges/_/yang dag ji bzhin dus kun du[#]/_/de myong med phyir de mi rigs/_/khyed ni ji ltar myong ba der/_/yang dag
[\[250b.6\]]nyid du'ang 'dod pa med/_/de ltar gzung dang 'dzin pa yi/_/rnam pa yod pa ma yin 'dod/_/rtag tu dngos po yod pa yi/_/shes pa de bzhin de myong med[#]/_/de lta min na 'gro ba kun/_/rtag tu de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang dag goms bya ched du de/_/thar 'dod rkang smyang
[\[250b.7\]]'dug la rag_/gcig la rnam pa gnyis 'gal phyir/_/ji ltar myong ba'i gzung ba dang /_/'dzin pa'i rnam snang de bzhin du/_/yang dag nyid ni ma yin no/_/gnas ngan len gyi bag chags las/_/ji ste 'khrul pa'i rtags byung na/_/'khrul pa nyid du de snang ba/_/'di ni
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]mngon sum grub pa med/_/'di ltar ma 'khrul mtshan nyid ni/_/mngon sum nyid du nye bar brjod/_/rtag tu bdag la 'khrul pa med[#]/_/ji ltar mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/_/gsal bar gnas kyi ngo bor ni/_/de ni rang snang nyid yin phyir/_/rang gi [#]ma 'khrul gang gyur pa/_/de las
[\[251a.2\]]'khrul pa tha dad med/_/ji ste 'khrul pa tha dad gyur/_/gnyis kyi ngo bo de gsal bar/_/de yang rang gi gnas yin na/_/ji ltar de ni shes par bya/_/ji ste shes pa de ni yid/_/gnyis kyi rnam par rnam rtog pa/_/de la 'khrul pa 'byung na ni/_/gnyis su 'dzin pa gsal
[\[251a.3\]]mi 'gyur/_/yid kyi 'khrul pa don gzhan du/_/'dra ba bor nas 'gro ba med/_/gang gis de ni 'khrul 'gyur ba/_/gnyis dang gnyis min mtshungs ci 'gyur/_/gang du 'ga' yis chung [#]zad kyang /_/lan 'ga' mthong ba ma yin na/_/gzhan gyi 'dra ba mthong phyir te/_/de la
[\[251a.4\]]'khrul par ji ltar 'gyur/_/'on te 'og [#]ma med pa yi/_/sa bon gnas ngan len smin las/_/'khrul na 'dra ba mthong med par/_/rang las skyes pa 'di nyid yin/_/de lta yin na'ang de yi tshe/_/'khrul pa don gzhan brtag mi rigs/_/shes pa thams cad rang nyid kyis/_/_
[\[251a.5\]]rang gi sa bon dag las 'khrul/_/'khrul pa'i sa bon las byung ba/_/thams cad yin par khyed kyang 'dod/_/de phyir pha rol min mthong ba'i/_/shes kun 'di ltar rang las 'khrul/_/de phyir mngon sum nyid 'di yi/_/gnyis min gang [#]dag grub pa med/_/de ma grub na de
[\[251a.6\]]yi phyir/_/rgyu 'bras de nyid grub [#]pa med/_/ji ste gnyis ni 'khrul gyur kyang /_/rtag tu rtogs pa'i ngo bo de/_/ma 'khrul pa dag kho nar ni/_/mngon sum las grub ma yin nam/_/rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid na spyir/_/yul la nye bar rjod byed pa/_/de ltar mngon sum yin gyur kyang /_/_
[\[251a.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid spyod yul min/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid ma gtogs par/_/'di ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo med/_/gang yang thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/ngo bo de ni gnyis su snang /_/rigs mi mthun pa rnams gsal bas/_/khyad par kho na spyi nyid yin/_/de yang brdzun pa'i rang bzhin
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]na/_/khyed kyi spyi yang ga la yod/_/dngos po rnams kyi yod pa nyid/_/bden yin gzhan ni brdzun zhes pa/_/rig byed mthar ni smra ba yi/_/grub mtha' gsal bar brjod par 'gyur[#]/_/gzhan du de dag shes pa can/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid skyes bur rigs/_/rtag pa gcig
[\[251b.2\]]yin bye brag rnams/_/de ni thams cad nor bar ni/_/lta ba de dag ngan pa yin/_/thams cad bcings dang grol 'gyur te/_/gcig ni bcings dang grol ba na/_/thams cad du yang cis mi 'gyur/_/'chi dang skye dang gnas pa dang /_/gnyid log sad dang glen la sogs
[\[251b.3\]]thams cad bye brag med pa'i phyir/_/cig car kho nar rab tu 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo yi/_/mtshan nyid mkhas pas bstan pa ni/_/snang ba gzhan la mi ltos par/_/gang zhig rang nyid rtag tu snang /_/de ltar yin na gnyis snang ba/_/rang nyid rab tu gsal
[\[251b.4\]]ba'i phyir/_/rtog pa'i ngo bos gzung ba yi/_/bdag nyid rtag tu gnas pa yin/_/de ni rtag tu brdzun [#]nyid kyi/_/rigs kyi khyim du 'jug pa 'di/_/khyad par med pa bdag nyid dag_/nges par pang du blangs nas 'jug_/ji ste rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/brdzun pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_/_
[\[251b.5\]]rnal 'byor spyod [#]gzhan de bzhin no[#]/_/de ni spong byed ma yin nam/_/ma spangs phyin ci log 'gyur zhing /_/spangs pas rnal 'byor can du 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor mngon sum rig bya ba/_/yang dag de yin mi rigs na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang mi 'grub
[\[251b.6\]]cing /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/ye shes ring du spangs pa yin/_/de lta yin na thal sgo nas/_/ji sta de la bden zhen spongs/_/sgrub na de bzhin 'dod pa'i phyir/_/'dod pa kho na rab tu bsgrubs/_/'on te dngos po thams cad du/_/med pa'i mtshan nyid de sgrub na/_/mi mthun
[\[251b.7\]]phyogs las ma log phyir/_/gtan tshigs ma nges nyid du 'gyur/_/brdzun pa yin zhes thams cad du/_/gtang bar 'os pa ma yin no/_/sgyu ma rnams ni brdzun nyid kyang /_/de byed pa rnams nye bar brten/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams la/_/nam yang mkho bar mi 'gyur gang /_/_
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]de dag thams cad yongs btang [#]zhing /_/spong ba nyid du rigs pa yin/_/bdag gzhan don gyi rnam pa la/_/mkho ba'i yon tan gang yin pa/_/mkhas shing snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis/_/de dag ji ltar spong bar byed/_/de phyir ji srid gzhan don la/_/nye bar
[\[252a.2\]]mkho bar 'gyur ba rnams/_/spangs kyang sangs rgyas rnam dag ni/_/de dag thams cad zlog [#]pa med/_/thams cad sgyu ma byas 'dra zhes/_/brdzun pa nyid du de dag shes/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/de [#]de phyin ci log pa med/_/dngos po nyid du blang ba dang /_/dngos
[\[252a.3\]]po med pa dor ba yi/_/rgyud [#]ni nges pa ma yin te/_/'di la 'khrul pa de ltar snang /_/nyan thos pa la sogs pa dag_/dngos por lta ba rnams kyis ni/_/sdug bsngal kun kyang gtong bar [#]byed/_/'gog pa dngos po med pa'ang len/_/snying rjes khrid pa'i rnal 'byor
[\[252a.4\]]rnams/_/gzhan don bya ba'i ched du ni/_/glang po la sogs brdzun pa yang /_/sprul pa rab tu byed pa yin/_/de bzhin gzhan la phan par bzhed/_/thabs dang shes rab brten pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni phyin ci log_/spangs kyang bzhugs par bzhed pa yin/_/de
[\[252a.5\]]bzhin brdzun pa'i ngo bo yang /_/rgyu med can 'byung gang na'ang med/_/sgyu ma sogs pa [#]brdzun yin yang /_/tshogs pa rnams las 'byung bar snang /_/sgyu ma la sogs 'khrul pa'i phyir/_/rjes su 'gro ba'ang ma grub phyir/_/rgyu dang ldan pa yin zhes te/_/dngos po yod par
[\[252a.6\]]'gyur ba'ang med/_/gang zhig thog ma med pa nas/_/kun rdzob tu yang gcig nas gcig_/rgyu med gyur pa de dag ni/_/brdzun par yang ni 'byung ba med/_/de bas rang rgyu tshogs pa yi/_/sna tshogs rnam par 'brel pa las/_/sgyu ma ji ltar rab tu 'byung /_/rnal
[\[252a.7\]]'byor sgyu ma'ang de bzhin no/_/rnal 'byor ye shes dag gi rgyu/_/rang gi bsod nams ye shes tshogs/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ni/_/blo ldan snying rje shes rab yin/_/'gro ba ma lus sgyu ma bzhin/_/gnas par shes rab dag gis [#]rig_/rmongs byed sgyu ma'i mkhan
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]po 'dra/_/sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyi mthus/_/chu nang pad+ma 'dam gyis ltar/_/srid pa'i skyon gyis yong mi gos/_/dpag med rmad byung bsam mi khyab/_/ma lus yon tan pha rol phyin/_/ji srid 'khor ba 'di dag na/_/'gro ba ma lus don sgrub phyir/_/thub pa
[\[252b.2\]]thugs rje chen po yis/_/gzhan la rag lus bzhugs pa yin/_/de bas stong pa nyid brten pa/_/ma [#]la bya ba bzhin du gsungs/_/de [#]lhung 'gyur ba dgag pa'i phyir/_/thabs la'ang brten par bya ba yin/_/rnam pa ma lus thams cad dang /_/'gro ba gsum po dag
[\[252b.3\]]la yang /_/don dam kun rdzob ngo bo nyid/_/ji ltar snang bzhin mngon sum ste/_/'jig rten pa dag mngon sum ni/_/ji ltar snang bcas snang med shes/_/de bzhin nus pa bsam yas phyir/_/rig ste de bas thams cad mkhyen/_/yang dag don bsgoms las byung ba'i/_/_
[\[252b.4\]]ye shes de ni rnam mi rtog_/chos rnams snang med gang yin pa/_/des na yang dag ye shes brjod/_/des na bdag nyid chen po yi/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa grub/_/rnal 'byor kun shes yang dag shes/_/rnam par gzhag pa 'gal ba med/_/rtogs pa'i ngo bo gang yin
[\[252b.5\]]bden/_/gnyis kyi rnam pa gzhan [#]dag min/_/'dod pa de ni sngar bshad pa'i/_/skyon du rab tu 'gyur ba yin/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams ni/_/'di ltar gnyis snang tha dad med/_/shes pa'i ngo bo spong bar yang /_/de las gzhan bzhin cis mi byed/_/ji ste gnod pa med
[\[252b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_/khyed cag de ni mi byed na/_/yang dag don dang dbyer med pas/_/gnyis po'ang bya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos la bdag med bsgom pa rnams/_/don med 'gyur te gnyis las gzhan/_/kun brtags chos ni yod pa min/_/'on te gang zhig nyon mongs can/_/_
[\[252b.7\]]gnyis kyi ngo bo lung ma bstan/_/de dang rtogs pa'i ngo bo dag_/bcas te rnal 'byor pa rnams spong /_/bden par sgro 'dogs spangs pa'i phyir/_/skyob pa rnams kyis yongs btang yang /_/rnam par dag na'ang gnyis snang ba/_/'gro la phan dang bde byed de/_/sngon gyi smon lam
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]shugs dag las/_/thugs rje goms pa rnams kyis 'byung /_/gang phyir de ltar kho na yin/_/de bas rnal 'byor la sogs 'grub/_/rtag tu thub pa mi rtog par/_/yid bzhin nor bu bzhin bzhugs te/_/'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad par/_/gang
[\[253a.2\]]dag smra ba de la yang /_/gnyis po dag gi rnam pa las/_/rtog pa'i ngo bo dbyer med pa'i/_/rang gi ngo bo des spangs kyang /_/bzlog pa med pa kho na yin/_/'on kyang smon lam mthu rnams dang /_/tshogs kyi shugs kyis thub pa ni/_/'khrul pa ma lus rnam spangs na/_/dri med
[\[253a.3\]]bstan pa gnyis su med/_/ye shes dag pa 'byung ba de/_/rtag tu yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/_/skal ba [#]ji bzhin ma lus don/_/bya ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen/_/grub ces brjod pa de bas na/_/thams cad mkhyen sogs rnam par gnas/_/de lta yin na thub pa yi/_/_
[\[253a.4\]]gnyis su gnang [#]ba brdzun yin yang /_/ji ste 'dod na byang chub kyang /_/dbyer med de bzhin 'dod par gyis/_/brdzun pa dag ni rab spangs kyang /_/thub pa'i thabs kyi [#]mthu rnams las/_/'byung na de tshe byang chub kyi/_/bden par mngon zhen gang zhig yin/_/mi rtog ye
[\[253a.5\]]shes gang yin pa/_/de yod pa ni sel mi byed/_/'on kyang yang dag dngos po nyid/_/de ni 'grub par nyid mi 'gyur/_/rnam par mi rtog ga las 'grub/_/gnyis su rnam rtog spangs pa yis/_/rnam par mi rtog de 'dod na'ang /_/rang gi dngos la rnam rtog 'di/_/gang gis
[\[253a.6\]]brtsal ba smra bar gyis/_/de la sun [#]ni ma phyung bar/_/rnam par rtog des spong ba med/_/dngos por 'dzin pa sangs rgyas kyis/_/mtha' nyid du ni rab tu bstan/_/skyob pa'i ma 'dres chos rnams dang /_/de bzhin byams pa thugs rje sogs/_/gsungs pa gang yin de dag ni/_/_
[\[253a.7\]]mi rtog 'di yin bsgrub par dka'/_/ji ste 'dul ba [#]de bzhin du/_/so sor snang zhes rnam rtog na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan kun/_/kun brtags nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/gnas skabs kun tu rtag par yang /_/rtog bcas mi rtog pa'ang rung /_/yong ye bsam
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]par mi nus phyir/_/rnam pa kun nas thams cad rig_/de ni skal ba ji bzhin du/_/lus can kun gyi 'dod pa'i don/_/sgrub par byed ces 'chad na ni/_/thams cad 'gal ba med pa yin/_/rtogs pa'i ngo bo yang dag pa/_/de bas mngon sum grub pa med/_/rgyu dang
[\[253b.2\]]'bras bu de dag kyang /_/de ma grub na de 'grub [#]med/_/tha dad dus kyi bdag nyid gnyis/_/des ni so sor mi myong phyir/_/rang rig pa yi mngon sum las/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs [#]pa med/_/bdag nyid gcig gi ngo bo'i phyir/_/gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid mi srid/_/de ni
[\[253b.3\]]ltos pas tha dad na'ang /_/kun brtags yin gyis yang dag min/_/ltos par bya ba tha dad phyir/_/rang rig pa yis 'dzin pa med/_/de ma bzung na de mi 'grub/_/ltos pa de yang kun brtags yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dzin pa ni/_/so sor rab tu rtogs pa las/_/rnam
[\[253b.4\]]par rtog de mtshams sbyar nas/_/de gnyis gsal grub ma yin nam/_/de mi rigs te rnam rtog kyang /_/rang rig pa yi mthar thug pas/_/gzhan dngos lan 'ga'ang ma mthong na/_/de na ji ltar mtshams sbyor byed/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyang /_/rang gi ngo bo rtogs phyir
[\[253b.5\]]dang /_/dran pa'ang bdag nyid mthar thug phyir/_/de la dran pa'ang mi 'grub bo/_/gzhan du 'dzin pa'i don dag ni/_/gzhan du sbyar bar mi rigs so/_/rgyu rkyen [#]dag la ma gtogs par/_/rgyu ni ma brtags yod pa min/_/gzhan gyis 'bras bu tsam la 'dzin/_/de bzhin rgyu
[\[253b.6\]]tsam gzhan gyis 'dzin/_/gnyi ga cig car myong med na/_/long bas gnyis sbyor byed dam ci/_/ci tsam 'bras bu mi snang zhing /_/rgyu yang 'ga' yis ma yin pa/_/de srid bdag ni 'bras bu las/_/sogs pa'i ngo bo des myong med/_/chu sogs rnam pa'i rnam par shes/_/_
[\[253b.7\]]'das ma thag tu me sogs kyis/_/rnam par 'byung ba shes pa dang /_/du ba'i shes las me blo mthong /_/de phyir me las du ba dang /_/sa bon nyid las myu gu zhes/_/bya ba la sogs rgyu 'bras kyi/_/nges pa 'grub pa med par 'gyur/_/gzhan las kyang ni du ba dag_/'byung phyir du ba
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]mthong ba las/_/mer snang ba yin [#]rnam par shes/_/rjes su dpag pa'ang mi 'grub po/_/me dang du ba'i blo gnyis dag_/'dra bar 'byung ba [#]nges yod na/_/du ba kho na rtags yin gyi/_/me ma yin de ci yi phyir/_/ji ltar du ba'i blo dag gis/_/bag chags
[\[254a.2\]]gsal bar sad byas te/_/me blo rtogs byed de bzhin du/_/me blo'ang de la ji ste min/_/de ltar kun las shes pa kun/_/'byung ba dag ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/kun gyi rtags su kun gyur pas/_/kye ma'o go byed gnas pa yin/_/de bas re zhig mngon sum las/_/rgyu 'bras rtogs pa
[\[254a.3\]]yang dag pa/_/yod pa ma yin des na 'di/_/mngon sum gnyis ni nges pa med/_/de gnyis dang ni rtags 'gyur yang /_/'brel pa rab tu ma grub phyir/_/rjes su dpag pa dag las kyang /_/rgyu 'bras dngos po grub pa med/_/rtags dang 'brel pa [#]nges pa ni/_/mngon sum nyid du grub
[\[254a.4\]]med de/_/de gnyis lkog tu 'gyur ba'i [#]phyir/_/sngar ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin/_/gnas pa med par 'di thal phyir/_/rjes su dpag pas kyang mi rigs/_/'brel pa nges pa med pa yi/_/rtags las de dngos med [#]pa'ang med/_/rtags kyang mngon sum nyid du ni/_/grub pa ma yin
[\[254a.5\]]de dngos bzhin/_/rjes su dpag pas mi 'grub ste/_/de bzhin 'dir yang gnas pa med/_/ji ste rgyu 'bras dngos po yi/_/yod pa sgrub par byed na ni/_/de tshe gtan tshigs thams cad dag_/nyes pa gsum las ldog pa med/_/'di ltar yod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dngos po
[\[254a.6\]]rnams kyi chos kyis sam/_/dngos po med dang gnyi ga'i 'am/_/gnyis min chos kyi gtan tshigs gang [#]/_/dngos ma grub na de la brten/_/dngos po'i chos ni grub pa med/_/de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/med pa'i chos ni 'gal bar 'gyur/_/gnyi ga'i chos ni
[\[254a.7\]]ma nges te/_/gnyen po la yang yod pa'i phyir/_/gnyis min chos kyi ngo bo dag_/yid kyis kyang ni rig pa med/_/'on te yod pa mi sgrub kyi/_/de gnyis 'brel pa can sgrub ni/_/sgrub pa de yang rigs pa yin/_/de lta min na gtan tshigs kun/_/gzhi ma grub par thal
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_/rang gi ngo bo de nyid [#]kyang /_/grub pa med par sngar bstan zin/_/gzhan yang 'bras de grub bya'i [#]phyir/_/rgyu la nus pa yod pa min/_/de grub na ni 'grub 'gyur na/_/grub na rgyu des ci zhig bya/_/de bas gcig la gcig brten nas/_/de gnyis grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/_
[\[254b.2\]]bdag nyid rab tu ma grub par/_/gzhan gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/_/du ba las ni me shes te/_/chu skyar las ni chur shes zhes/_/bya ba la sogs 'bras bu gang /_/gsungs pa de ni tha snyad brten/_/yang dag du yang dus la sogs/_/mdo sde gzhan las bkag phyir dang /_/_
[\[254b.3\]]yang dag nyid kyi dngos de ni/_/rigs pas kyang ni mi 'grub bo/_/de grub bya phyir rang gzhan gyi/_/gtan tshigs kyang ni brtag med de/_/gzhi ni rab tu ma grub pas/_/rang nyid de ni ma grub phyir/_/gzhi yod na yang grub bya'i [#]phyir/_/spyi ru rab tu sgrub byed pa/_/tha snyad du ni 'dod pa'i
[\[254b.4\]]phyir/_/'di ltar grub pa sgrub pa yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di/_/yang dag nyid du grub bya'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs 'di yi rjes 'gro ba/_/ma grub brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs/_/skye ba'i chos can gang yin pa/_/de kun 'jig pa'i chos can zhes/_/bya ba la sogs skye
[\[254b.5\]]'jig nyid/_/mdo sde las na gsungs pa gang /_/de ni gang zag bdag med tsam/_/yang dag nyid la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/nyan thos pa yi dbang du gsungs/_/zab mo'i gtam la brten pa min/_/chos rnams kun gyi yang dag nyid/_/skye dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid du/_/rjes su
[\[254b.6\]]mthong ba de dag gi_/shes rab gzugs brnyan yin par gsungs/_/de yod na ni yod min [#]zhes/_/de grub bya phyir brjod pa yang /_/bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gnyis/_/de la bye brag mngon pa med/_/'on te rab tu rmongs rnams kyis/_/tha snyad rung bar bya ba ste/_/bsgrub par bya
[\[254b.7\]]bde bas na/_/dam bcas phyogs gcig 'gyur ba med/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos can la/_/yang dag mngon sum grub na ni/_/tha snyad de ni bsgrub [#]la rag_/de yang ma grub sngar bstan zin/_/de yi tha snyad tsam dag ni/_/bsgrubs su zin kyang yang dag pa'i/_/dngos po mi
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'grub de yis 'dir/_/khyab pa gang du'ang ma grub bo/_/gzhan yang de yi dus na ni/_/'gro ba ma lus yod na yang /_/'bras bu yod pa yin pa'i phyir/_/de yi 'bras bur bsgrub [#]pa la/_/ma nges pa yi gtan tshigs 'gyur/_/ji ltar de yod na ni mthong /_/_
[\[255a.2\]]de med gyur na ma mthong ba/_/de bzhin mtshungs pa'i dus rnams kyi/_/yod dang med pa'ang de dang mtshungs/_/de ni grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun rnams la/_/brten te rjes 'gro ldog pa nyid/_/nges pa brjod pa ma yin nam/_/skad cig pa ni ma gtogs par/_/gang
[\[255a.3\]]yang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid/_/gang du'ang sman pa kha cig gis/_/nam yang gzung [#]bar nus pa med/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yi/_/yang dag pa ni spyad [#]pa yi/_/skabs 'di yin te skad cig las/_/gzhan du rgyun ni yang dag med/_/skad cig pa nyid 'bras bu dang /_/rgyu yang yang
[\[255a.4\]]dag yin grang na/_/de ma grub na rgyu 'bras kyi/_/yang dag nyid ni ji ltar 'grub/_/'on te yang ni rgyun gcig par/_/'byung ba rnams la de sgrub kyi/_/skad cig rgyun ni tha dad par/_/'byung ba rnams la ma yin na/_/tha snyad de yang mthong nas ni/_/de tshe de ni sgrub la rag_/_
[\[255a.5\]]rgyu dang 'bras bur rtogs pa yi/_/dngos po zhig na gang du bsgrub/_/ji ste de dang 'dra ba yi/_/gzhan gyi dngos la sgrub byed na/_/shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba ste/_/yang dag dngos de 'grub pa med/_/mi dmigs pa yi gtan tshigs kyis/_/dngos po de ni nges med de/_/gang
[\[255a.6\]]phyir de yis yod mi sgrub/_/'gog pa kho na sgrub par byed/_/mngon sum nyid dang mi dmigs pas/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu sgrub byed ces/_/gang smras 'dir ni mngon sum las/_/ma gtogs mi dmigs yod pa min/_/slob dpon rnams kyi sgrub pa de/_/tha snyad du na gsungs
[\[255a.7\]]pa dag_/de ni sgrub byed kho na zhes/_/rgyas par rab tu bstan [#]pa yin/_/mthong ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa dag_/ma mthong ba las gang na yod[#]/_/gang du snang de rjes 'gro las/_/gang de 'bras bu yin no zhes/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid bsgrub par/_/brjod [#]pa de la the tshom ni/_/ldog
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pa med de gzhan dag gi/_/rgyu las yin par dogs pa'i phyir/_/de na de yod pas sam ci/_/'on te rgyang ring gzhan gyis sam/_/mi snang 'dre la sogs pas sam/_/zhes ni the tshom 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zla ba la sogs ring gnas pa/_/rgyur ni khas mi len pa'ang med/_/'dre la
[\[255b.2\]]sogs pa 'bab [#]la sogs/_/byed pa dag kyang med dam ci/_/ma mthong tsam las 'di dag gi/_/snga nas yod pa nyid 'gog gi/_/gzhan dag rgyu nyid yin grub pa/_/de la gang gis zlog [#]par byed/_/de na yod na gang yod par/_/'gyur ba nyid ni de dag kyang /_/'dod rgyal
[\[255b.3\]]bar yang srid par ni/_/dogs pa de bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'dod rgyal nyid ni mi slu ba/_/gang gis skad cig mang po las/_/'on [#]te rtag par nges pa de/_/cung zad yod pa ma yin no/_/lan cig mthong ba'i don rnams kyang /_/gzhan du snang ba ma yin te/_/gzhan
[\[255b.4\]]du mthong la gzhan dag la/_/brtags par rigs pa ma yin no/_/gzhan dag yod las gang phyir phyir/_/gang mi 'byung ba de dag ni/_/de ni 'bras bu yin par [#]smras/_/ldog pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu de/_/sgrub pa gang yin de la yang /_/gzhan dag med par gyur pas na/_/de ma
[\[255b.5\]]byung zhes dogs pa'i phyir/_/the tshom de bzhin gnas pa yin/_/gzhan dag nus pa yod pa yi/_/rgyu zhes bye brag yod pa'i phyir/_/de ni gzhan dag log par ni/_/dogs pa med ces 'dod na yang /_/de ni mi rigs rgyu de nyid/_/bye brag yod par ga las grub/_/gzhan gyis yang ni
[\[255b.6\]]rgyu yi zhes/_/'di ni rjod [#]par yang byed cing /_/de dag log nyid ce na yang /_/de tshe de ni gnas pa med/_/des na ma nges pa yi phyir/_/bye brag grub pa ma yin no/_/rgyu 'bras ci zhes the tshom za/_/ma grub ces te grub bya'i [#]phyir/_/de dag nyid la kun brten [#]nas/_/grub par rtog pa ngo
[\[255b.7\]]mtshar che/_/de ltar rjes su dpag pas kyang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu grub pa med/_/skye ba rmi lam skye bzhin zhes/_/de yi phyir na mkhas pas brjod/_/rtag pa'i ngo bo bdag nyid kyang /_/mngon sum nyid du rtog pa med/_/bdag sogs shes pa gang du yang /_/tha snyad du yang myong med
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]phyir/_/de ni rtag tu ma bral la/_/de yod tsam las shes pa 'byung /_/de rtog rnams kyis [#]dus rtag tu/_/de yi bdag nyid bzhin yod 'gyur/_/phan pa dag ni mi byed na/_/yul du brtags [#]par mi rigs te/_/de rtog byed na'ang nyes pa 'dir/_/snga ma bzhin du ldog pa
[\[256a.2\]]med/_/de yi rnam shes rjes 'brang na/_/de dang 'brel phyir de bdag bzhin/_/shes pa de yang rtag yod 'gyur/_/yul nyid la ni shes pa de/_/ji ste rtag tu mi 'brang ste/_/de lta min na de shes pa'i/_/shes bya'i ngo bor 'gyur ba med/_/de yod sgrub la snga ma bzhin/_/gtan tshigs
[\[256a.3\]]kun ni thams cad du/_/nyes pa gsum gyi skyon chags phyir/_/rjes su dpag pas kyang mi 'grub/_/rim mam cig car 'jug pa yi/_/skyed pa nyid ni mi srid na/_/des na rtag pa'i 'bras bu las/_/'di yod nges pa ma yin no/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog nyid kyi[#]/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'grub
[\[256a.4\]]yin na/_/de na ma bral yod na yang /_/lan 'ga' rtag tu med pa'i phyir/_/bdag la sogs pa gang du yang /_/'bras bu bde sogs rjes 'gro med/_/bde ba la sogs log pa yang /_/rtag pa rnams la mi srid do/_/mi shes rmongs pas brtags pa yis/_/bde la sogs pas de
[\[256a.5\]]sgrub tu/_/de bas 'bras bu ma grub phyir/_/'bras bu dag las de nges med/_/chos can dag ni ma grub na/_/rang bzhin gtan tshigs 'dir mi srid/_/yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin phyir/_/mi dmigs pa yang rung ba min/_/de ltar yang ni dngos po ni/_/tshad ma dag las grub pa med/_/_
[\[256a.6\]]tshad ma gnyis las ma gtogs pa'i/_/tshad ma gzhan yang yod pa min/_/don ni grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/phyi rol gtan tshigs yod min nam/_/'di ltar tha ma la mig la sogs/_/sngon po la sogs snang ba gang /_/de ni rgyu gzhan 'dra ba las/_/skyes so zhes ni rtog par byed/_/shes
[\[256a.7\]]pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/_/shes pa bzhin du slu ba med/_/skye ba yang dag sgrub pa'i phyir/_/'dir ni dpe 'grub med pa yin/_/kun rdzob tu yang ma 'brel phyir/_/ma nges pa yi gtan tshigs 'gyur/_/rgyu yis rang dang 'dra ba dag_/'bras bu la bskyed [#]nges med de/_/shing sogs
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i/_/me tog la sogs sna tshogs srid/_/rgyu gzhan gyis ni tsam bsgrubs kyang /_/phyir rol don ni mi 'grub ste/_/khyad par du ni de dag gi/_/rjes 'gro gang du'ang ma grub bo/_/rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan pa/_/gzung ba'i rnam pa sngo la sogs/_/yang dag
[\[256b.2\]]med pas bsgrub bya dang /_/dpe yi chos can tha dad med/_/mi slu bar yang phyi rol don/_/phrad pa ji ste 'dod na ni/_/de tshe nyid bsgrub [#]bya yin phyir/_/de tshe gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/don byed pa dag snang tsam gyis/_/ngo bo ji ste 'dod na ni/_/rmi lam dag na don med kyang /_/_
[\[256b.3\]]de bzhin mthong phyir ma nges 'gyur/_/ldog pa las kyang phyi rol don/_/'grub par rigs pa ma yin te/_/rjes su 'gro ba med par yang /_/ldog pa nam yang 'grub pa med/_/nus pa bral ma thag tu yang /_/ldog pa nyid du rab gyur pa[#]/_/gang du'ang shes pa don rtogs pa'i/_/rjes su
[\[256b.4\]]'gro ba 'grub pa med/_/gzhan dag nus pa yod na ni/_/shes pa log pa med pa nyid/_/grub dang ma grub the tshom phyir/_/'on kyang don ni grub pa med/_/bdag ni shes 'di ma skyes pa/_/de ma thag dang bral bas sam/_/'on te don dang bral ba zhes/_/the tshom dag kyang 'byung bar
[\[256b.5\]]'gyur/_/rgyu ldan gzhal bya nyid sogs kyis/_/phyi rol don sgrub skyon chags par/_/mu stegs rnams kyis smras pa gang /_/de ni tshul 'dis rig par [#]gyis/_/de ltar phyi rol don dag ni/_/rjes su dpag las grub pa med/_/shes pa smra ba'i shes pa yang /_/yang dag pa ni yod pa
[\[256b.6\]]min/_/shes pa gnyis su med pa de/_/rtag tu dbang po las 'das phyir/_/rtags kyis [#]'di ni rnam nges pa'i/_/'brel pa yang ni yod pa min/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos can la/_/rang bzhin nyid ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/'di ltar rang bzhin zhes bya'i rtags/_/'di sgrub pa la yod pa
[\[256b.7\]]min/_/gnyis su med pa'i shes pa la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub phyir/_/des na 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i/_/rtags ni gang yang srid pa med/_/gnyis su med la ma gtogs par/_/'bras bur khyed 'dod cung zad med/_/de nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir/_/khyed kyi de yang ma grub bo/_/gnyis
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]de grub pa gang yin pa'ang /_/'bras bu yang dag nyid med de/_/de ni rtag tu ma skyes phyir/_/rta yi rwa la sogs pa bzhin/_/'gog pa'i yul can nyid du ni/_/de ni mkhas pas brjod pa'i phyir/_/de yod sgrub par byed pa la/_/mi dmigs pa yang rigs pa
[\[257a.2\]]min/_/dga' dang gdung ba'i rang bzhin sogs/_/de ni gsal bar des bzung phyir/_/rnam shes mtshan nyid chos can ni/_/byis pa yan chad grub min nas/_/de la'ang gnyis kyi ngo bo ni/_/'gal phyir de ni dben par du/_/bsgrub bya grang ba'i ngo bo yi/_/dro ba ji ltar dben pa
[\[257a.3\]]bzhin/_/gang yang gang gi ngo bo gsal/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yang /_/gcig dang du ma bral phyir dang /_/de med par de [#]de med phyir/_/de phyir shes pa gnyis med grub/_/khyed cag gnyis po dben pa tsam/_/ji ste sgrub par 'dod na ni/_/de ni grub pa sgrub yin te/_/gang
[\[257a.4\]]phyir bden pa nyid mi 'dod/_/yin pas sgo nas shes pa la/_/gnyis kyi rnam pa dben pa nyid/_/sgrub na 'dir yang 'dod pa dang /_/mi 'gal phyir na grub pa sgrub/_/don dam nyid du ma skyes pa'i/_/rnam shes bdag nyid chos can la/_/gnyis kyi rnam pa dben pa nyid/_/'dod
[\[257a.5\]]na yang dag gang zhig yin/_/ji ste gnyis med ngo bo dang /_/dngos po nyid du'ang rtogs byed cing /_/shes pa gnyi ga sgrub 'dod na/_/de ltar rjes 'gro 'dir mi 'grub[#]/_/dpe ni bsgrub byas stong pa ste/_/kun tu brtags pa brjod pa'i phyir/_/yang dag pa yi dngos po nyid/_/dro ba'i reg
[\[257a.6\]]pa grub pa med/_/phyi rol don gyi ngo bo ru/_/dro ba'i reg pa 'dod na yang /_/de ni gnyi gar ma grub ces/_/brtag pa ci ga ma byas sam/_/grang dro'i rag [#]gnyis rnam shes kyi/_/rnam pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni/_/shes pa gcig la'ang snang ba'i phyir/_/yang dag nyid du 'gal ba med/_/_
[\[257a.7\]]sgrub par byed pas stong pa yi/_/dpe 'di yin pa de yis [#]mngon/_/ma brtags pa yi ngo bo la/_/dper byed na'ang 'dod grub med/_/'on te'ang gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid/_/bral bar grub [#]pa'i don gyis na/_/shes pa'i dngos po nyid kyang ni/_/rab tu grub ces sems na ni/_/'brel ba rab tu ma
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]grub pas/_/de mi rigs te dngos po yis/_/gnyis kyi rnam pa dben pa la/_/khyab pa gang du'ang ma grub bo/_/gang dang gang na gnyis med pa/_/de dang de na dngos yod par/_/'di la 'brel ba bya ba'i phyir/_/mi mthun phyogs sel tshad ma med/_/nam mkha'i me tog la sogs
[\[257b.2\]]dang /_/gnyis de nyid kyis [#]ma nges 'gyur/_/gnas pa med par thal ba'i phyir/_/gnyis la gzhan gnyis yod pa min/_/gnyis dang gnyis med ngo bo dag_/ji ste 'gal ba yod na ni/_/gcig tu gnas par mi 'gyur te/_/grang dang dro ba de gnyis bzhin/_/'on te ma
[\[257b.3\]]rig dbang gis na/_/de la gnyis ni brdzun pa snang /_/des na 'gal ba med yin te/_/dngos po nyid la de bzhag phyir/_/ji ste 'gal ba med nyid na/_/ji ste der ni 'dir la gnod/_/'gal ba med pa can dag la/_/dro la grang bzhin gnod mi srid/_/bden dang bden min ngo bo
[\[257b.4\]]dag_/ji ltar 'gal ba nyid mi 'gyur/_/brdzun pa nyid du ji ltar snang /_/brdzun pa'i ngo bo snang yin na/_/shes pa yang ni brdzun par 'gyur/_/de lta min na 'gal ba de/_/snang ba'i ngo bor ji ltar 'gyur/_/brdzun pa yin na'ang gang du gnyis/_/gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can
[\[257b.5\]]du/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid grub pa med/_/des na gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/gnyis kyi [#]rnam shes kho na ni/_/de nyid rang gsal ba yi [#]phyir/_/gnyis su snang ba ma gtogs par/_/chos can nyid ni yod pa min/_/gcig dang du ma dben pa'i phyir/_/gzung ba ji ltar stong pa nyid/_/_
[\[257b.6\]]shes pa'ang de las dbyer med pa/_/de bzhin stong pa nyid du gnod/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yang /_/ji ltar rnam par snang bar ni/_/'gal ba med pa de bzhin gzhan/_/shes pa la sogs ji bzhin [#]'gal/_/rnam par shes pa [#]gnyis yod pa/_/cha shas gnyis ni mi rigs phyir/_/_
[\[257b.7\]]mdo sde pa la sogs pa yis/_/yang dag nyid du 'dod pa med/_/gnyis su med pa'i rnam shes la/_/phyi rol don yang mi 'gal phyir/_/des na gnyis med ngo bo nyid/_/sgrub na ci zhig bsgrubs par 'gyur/_/ji ste tshad ma gzhan dag gis/_/phyi rol gnod par brjod na ni/_/rnam
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]par shes pa'ang de bzhin du/_/rab tu gnod par cis [#]mi 'dod/_/gcig dang du ma bral ba'i phyir/_/don ni sna tshogs ngo bo dag_/ji ltar yang dag mi rigs pa/_/de bzhin rnam shes kyang 'dod kyis/_/de bas tshad mas grub pa yis/_/don dam dngos
[\[258a.2\]]po yod ma yin[#]/_/des na rtog dang ldan rnams kyis/_/yod pa'i tha snyad 'dir mi rigs/_/gnod par byed pa'ang yod pa'i phyir/_/'di la kun du the tshom yod/_/dngos por med pa smra bar yang /_/tshad ma med par mi rigs so/_/'di ltar dngos po kun dben pa/_/mngon sum
[\[258a.3\]]dag gis rtogs pa med/_/de yi stobs kyis 'byung ba'i phyir/_/don de dngos po nyid la yin/_/gzhan yang gzhan gyis dben pa yi/_/phyogs la sogs pa 'dzin na ni/_/de las gzhan pas dben pa nyid/_/mngon sum dag gis rtogs pa yin/_/dngos po gang zhig rnam
[\[258a.4\]]brtags na/_/dngos po kun gyis [#]dben pa nyid/_/mngon sum nyid du rtogs 'gyur ba/_/dngos po med par smra ba la'ang /_/thams cad nang du de 'dus phyir/_/chos rnams kun gyi dngos po yis/_/dben pa ci yang yod pa min/_/de lta ma yin dam bcas nyams/_/thams cad
[\[258a.5\]]dngos po med yin na/_/bsgrub bya dpe yi chos can dang /_/gtan tshigs la sogs ma grub phyir/_/rjes su dpag pas rig pa med/_/gzhan yang rang bzhin 'bras bu yi/_/gtan tshigs gnyis kyi [#]de mi sgrub/_/de gnyis dngos po nyid sgrub ste/_/dngos po med par 'gal ba
[\[258a.6\]]nyid/_/ma skyes ngo bo'i chos yin na/_/de yi gtan tshigs gang 'gyur ba/_/'bras bu dang ni rang bzhin dag_/gang yang yod pa ma yin no/_/yul dang dus sogs bye brag gis/_/sngo dang bde sogs ngo bo bzhin/_/dngos po rnams ni dmigs pa'i phyir/_/mi dmigs pa yang grub pa
[\[258a.7\]]med/_/gzhan yang gzhan gyis dben pa'i don/_/mngon sum rtogs pa yod na ni/_/de la gzhan don dben pa yi/_/tha snyad bsgrub pa rab tu byed/_/rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dag gis/_/thams cad dben par mi 'gyur te/_/des na bdag nyid mi dmigs pas/_/re zhig de ni
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sgrub mi byed/_/khyab bya khyab par byed pa yi/_/dngos po la sogs grub yin na/_/khyab bya la sogs dgag pa la/_/khyab byed mi dmigs la sogs sbyor/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/khyab par bya la sogs grub par/_/'ga' dang lhan cig ci ste nges/_/de tshe dngos por
[\[258b.2\]]bcas pa yin/_/chos rnams ma lus dngos med par/_/sgrub na dpe ni yod pa min/_/nyi tshe ba dag rab bsgrub na/_/mi 'dod par ni 'gyur ba med/_/dngos po med pa bsgrub pa la/_/dngos po'i chos kyi gtan tshigs 'gal/_/med pa'i chos kyang 'brel pa med/_/gnyis la
[\[258b.3\]]brten pa 'khrul par 'gyur/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/_/skyes bu kun gyi mngon sum gyis/_/rtogs pa med ces bya ba 'dir/_/khyod la mtshan ma ci zhig yod/_/de ni 'gal bar [#]bya ba la/_/rang gi dmigs pa log pa yang /_/ma nges phyir na thams cad kyis[#]/_/_
[\[258b.4\]]dmigs pa log par nges pa med/_/rab rib can bzhin gzugs la sogs/_/brdzun pa rnams ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/yang dag pa yi dngos po'i don/_/mngon sum 'ga' yang grub pa med/_/yang dag don bsgoms rab mtha' las/_/byung ba'i ye shes yang dag pa'i/_/don gyi
[\[258b.5\]]yul can yin 'dod kyi/_/dmigs pa'i stobs kyis byung ba min/_/de dag kho na don dam pa/_/mthong ba gang yin mthong med yin/_/'gro ba'i chos rnams shes rab kyi/_/thams cad ji bzhin mthong ba min/_/chos kun snang med gang yin te/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i 'das pa
[\[258b.6\]]yi/_/ye shes de nyid chos rnams la/_/mthong ba med par nye bar brjod/_/chos rnams ma lus ji bzhin du/_/bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis byung ba'i phyir/_/dngos po med pa ma yin yang /_/de ni 'khrul pa gang yang med/_/rnal 'byor de yi rtogs de ni/_/so sor rang rig bsam
[\[258b.7\]]mi khyab/_/da [#]ni kun du gsal bya bar/_/nus pa dag la yod pa min/_/'khrul pa gang yin 'khrul nyid du/_/ji lta bzhin du de kun rtogs/_/de yang des na 'di dag la/_/ma 'khrul pa yis brjod pa yin/_/yang dag pa las ldog med do/_/dngos rnams yang dag med
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]yin yang /_/rang gi tshogs las rnal 'byor pa'i/_/shes pa byung zhes sngar bsgrubs zin/_/dngos po med par smra ba yis/_/sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam mtshungs/_/dngos po rnams la rjod byed kyi[#]/_/ri bong rwa dang 'dra bar min/_/las dang nyon mongs dbang gis
[\[259a.2\]]na/_/de ltar srid pa'i 'khor lo 'byung /_/rang gi tshogs las rnal 'byor pa'i/_/shes pa'i 'khor lo de bzhin 'byung /_/de ni ste'u dang tsan dan mnyam/_/shes rab [#]thugs rje dri ma med/_/chos kun phyin ci ma log par/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bzhugs pa yin/_/de dag kho nas
[\[259a.3\]]yang dag pa/_/mngon sum rtogs kyis gzhan dag ni/_/lung dang rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/rigs pa'i lam la mkhas pa yin/_/kha cig tu ni dngos po 'ga'/_/don gzhan gyis ni dben pa dag_/'dzin pa yod na stong pa nyid/_/mngon sum rtogs pa gang yin pa/_/_
[\[259a.4\]]dngos po rnams kyis [#]gcig la gcig_/stong pa nyid de yod par 'dod/_/chos rnams de yis stong pa can/_/mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/_/rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid du/_/ji ltar gzhag pa de dag ni/_/yang dag yod pa ma yin pas/_/des na chos kun nges [#]med 'dod/_/gcig la
[\[259a.5\]]gcig gis [#]stong pa nyid/_/brtags pa yin gyi yang dag min/_/sgyu ma la sogs mtshungs pa la/_/gzhan gyis dben pa yang dag med/_/rmi lam bzhin du dngos po kun/_/phan tshun dben pa bzhin du snang /_/de yi dbang gis 'di dag gi/_/gcig la gcig gis [#]stong pa nyid/_/brtags
[\[259a.6\]]yin de'i phyir rang byung gis/_/tha chad spangs pa [#]kho nar gsungs[#]/_/de bas de la brten nas ni/_/sun 'byin pa ni rigs pa min/_/mtshan nyid stong nyid gang yin pa/_/de ni chos la brtags pa min/_/rnal 'byor pa yis [#]shes pa yis/_/de yang ji ltar bstan bzhin rtogs/_/goms
[\[259a.7\]]par byas na brdzun pa yang /_/shin tu gsal bar snang ba yin/_/de bas yang dag bsgom byas na/_/rnam par gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung /_/gsal zhing mi slu la sogs pa'i/_/rnal 'byor ye shes gang yin pa/_/de ni mngon sum mtshan nyid grub/_/der gyur de phyir tshad ma yin/_/tshad
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ma ldan pa'i yul nyid kyis/_/mi slu la sogs phyi nas 'chad/_/des na blo dang ldan pa yi/_/rnal 'byor shes pa spang mi rigs/_/ji ste yang dag nyid brten nas/_/chos can la sogs ma grub par/_/gleng bar byed na de yi tshe/_/mi 'dod gyur pa med bstan zin/_/de ltar don dam nyid du na/_/_
[\[259b.2\]]khyod kyi sun 'byin pa dag kyang /_/gnas thod pa ni der med de/_/mkha' la dbyu gus rdeg pa bzhin/_/de lta yin yang tha snyad du/_/sun 'byin la sogs rab grub phyir/_/khyed kyis [#]sun 'byin smras pa dang /_/de bzhin nged kyis [#]tshad ma sogs/_/mkhas pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/_/tha snyad
[\[259b.3\]]kho nar de dag bstan/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rig pa dag_/med kyang ji ltar snang 'di la/_/dpag par bya dang dpog pa yi/_/'bras bu gnas par byed pa yin/_/de lta min na dngos gcig la/_/sna tshogs ngo bo snang ba yi/_/rnam pa [#]ji ltar bden 'gyur te/_/gcig pa nyid de
[\[259b.4\]]nyams par 'ong /_/chos dang chos can rnam gzhag dang /_/tha dad tha dad min ci 'dra/_/yang dag nyid don ma brtags kyi/_/'jig rten 'di [#]ltar grags pa la/_/de bzhin de la brten nas ni/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed rab gnas pa/_/don dam nyid la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/mkhas pas [#]brtags
[\[259b.5\]]pa yin zhe'o/_/'on kyang ji ste don dam par/_/tshad ma la sogs med na ni/_/tha snyad du yang de'i 'jug pa/_/'jig pa min zhes khyed sems na/_/blo de ngan te gang dag gis/_/de ldog pa na 'di ldog pa/_/yang dag ngo bo tha snyad la/_/khyab par nges pa ma yin no/_/rmi lam la sogs
[\[259b.6\]]de bzhin du/_/brdzun pa yin yang 'di dag snang /_/sprul pa nyid kyis 'gog [#]la sogs/_/ji lta ba bzhin 'dod pa yin/_/ji ste chos la sogs pa la/_/don dam grags pa'i yin na ni/_/de tshe 'di la ci phyir rtsod/_/gtan tshigs rnams kyis bsgrub ci dgos/_/ji ste nged la gtan
[\[259b.7\]]tshigs dang /_/chos can la sogs ma grub na/_/khyed kyis gang gis [#]sgrub pa smros/_/de 'grub 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang min/_/ji ltar chos can ma grub par/_/'gyur ba nged la khyed byed pa/_/de bzhin nged kyang khyed cag gi/_/dngos po ma grub sgrub par byed/_/tshad mas grub pa yin na ni/_/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]yod par khas blangs [#]rung bar 'dod/_/dpyod pa 'jug pa'i snga rol du/_/grub pa'i mtha' ni gang yang med/_/de bas dpyod pa'i dus na ni/_/grub mtha' rten ni 'ga' med na/_/de yi sgo nas chos can sogs/_/ma grub rtsod par su zhig byed/_/rang la grub
[\[260a.2\]]mtha' rnam nges nas/_/gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/'jug pa min nam de bas na/_/grub mtha' khas len snga nas gnas/_/rgol ba rang la rnam nges bzhin/_/gzhan gyi [#]nges pa bskyed 'dod pas/_/de tshe gtan tshigs dpe dag ni/_/rab tu sbyor ba ma yin nam/_/rang
[\[260a.3\]]la de nges byed pa na/_/grub mtha' khas len sngar ma yin/_/de bzhin gzhan rtog de byed pa/_/lung la ji ltar rten [#]par 'gyur/_/tha snyad du yang chos can sogs/_/'ga' yang gang la ma grub pa/_/de tshe chos can ma grub sogs/_/rtsod par sbyor ba rigs pa yin/_/mi 'khrug pa [#]yi
[\[260a.4\]]gtan tshigs kyis/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i don grub kyang /_/grub mtha' khas blang dgos phyir ro/_/mi 'grub ces pa gzhung re che/_/de bas grub mtha' las grub pa'i/_/chos can la brten mkhas mi byed/_/de lta bu yi rnam pa ni/_/kun la phan tshun ma grub phyir/_/gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan
[\[260a.5\]]tshigs dang /_/de bzhin bsgrub bya rjes 'gro med/_/rgol ba de dang slar rgol ba/_/gnyi ga la yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sgra sogs chos can bde gshegs pas/_/'byung ba las gyur la sogs par/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du/_/grangs can gzhan sogs de 'dod med/_/de bas
[\[260a.6\]]gzhung lugs kyis bskyed pa'i/_/bye brag chos can rnam gsal nas/_/gnag rdzi yan chad grags pa la/_/brten nas tshad ma la sogs pa/_/yang dag rtogs par 'dod pa yi/_/mkhas pa kun gyis de skad brjod/_/de bzhin bdag gi gzugs sgra dang /_/ro la sogs pa grags
[\[260a.7\]]pa la/_/ji ltar 'jig rten grags pa yi/_/rtog [#]par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/_/don dam pa la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/yang dag bsam pa rgyas par byed/_/des na grub mtha' las grub pa'i/_/chos can dag la brten nas ni/_/gzhi ma grub pa la sogs pa[#]/_/rgol ba
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]gang yin de 'brel med/_/gzhan yang dngos po ngo bo ni[#]/_/yin pa'i sgo nas gang du sgrub[#]/_/de la chos can dngos po yi/_/ngo bo yin zhes brtsal ba'i rigs/_/de ma grub na bsgrub bya ba[#]/_/rab tu grub pa'i bgegs byed phyir/_/gzhi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i/_/skyon yang der ni rjod [# ]
[\[260b.2\]]par byed/_/rtag pa la sogs sgro btags pa'i/_/dngos po'i chos ni dgag pa la[#]/_/bsgrub par bya dang 'gal ba yi/_/chos can dngos gyur ci ste 'dod/_/bsgrub bya'i chos dang rjes mthun pa/_/rigs pa shes pas chos nyid du/_/rtag tu byed pa de yi phyir/_/mkhas pas
[\[260b.3\]]rang gi chos can smos/_/dngos po med pa nyid kyi chos/_/bsgrub bya'i bdag nyid rjes mthun pa'i/_/dngos po med nyid chos can yin/_/de bas 'di ma grub pa min/_/'di ltar nam mkha' la sogs pa'i/_/rtag pa nyid sogs dgag pa la/_/cig car sgra sogs rgyu yin nyid/_/_
[\[260b.4\]]gtan tshigs rigs pa shes pas smras/_/ldog pa tsam gyis [#]ngo bo yi/_/gtan tshigs la sogs der grub pas/_/dngos med ngo bo'i chos can la/_/'dod pa 'grub pa'i bgegs yod min/_/de bzhin sgyu ma la sogs pa'i/_/ngo bo dngos po thams cad la/_/byis pa dngos po
[\[260b.5\]]nyid la sogs/_/sgro 'dogs byed pa gang mi mkhas/_/de dag yang dag 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis tha snyad du/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos sogs la/_/khyab par byed pa bkag phyir dang /_/nus pa la sogs bkag pa yis/_/dngos po nyid sogs sgro btags pa/_/_
[\[260b.6\]]de lta min na gzhan dag gis/_/brtags pa'i rtag [#]pa la sogs pa'i/_/dngos po dgag pa ji ltar bya/_/re zhig yod pa tshad ma yis/_/dgag par nus pa ma yin no/_/de bas dgag par mi bya na'ang /_/gtam gyi rgyun de chad par 'gyur/_/gcig min du ma yin pas/_/_
[\[260b.7\]]yul gyi rdul phran shin tu chung /_/de la sogs pa phyi rol don/_/ji ltar dgag pa brjod par bya/_/skad cig ma yin yod pa yin[#]/_/rim dang rim min de 'gal te/_/nus pa bkag pa'i sgo dag nas/_/mu stegs ngan pas brtags pa yi/_/rtag pa'i dngos po dgag pa dang /_/_
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]yon tan la sogs dgag pa la/_/gzhi ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon/_/thal bar sgrub pa nyid yin pas/_/ji ste de 'dir mi 'byung na/_/tshad ma med na de yi tshe/_/med pa'i tha snyad 'dir mi 'gyur/_/thal ba'ang tshad ma yin na ni/_/'di la de skyon cir mi 'byung /_/_
[\[261a.2\]]rang dga'i dbang gis phul [#]rtag tu/_/rigs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/'on te yang ni de la bzhi/_/blo yod pa nyid chos can yin/_/phyi dang gtso bo la sogs pas/_/de la bskyed bya nyid 'gog na/_/de ltar yin na de dgag phyir/_/nus pa stong pa nyid dang ni/_/gcig dang du [# ]
[\[261a.3\]]ma bral la sogs/_/de lta ji ltar tshad ma 'grub/_/gtan tshigs rang nyid ma grub par/_/de la bsgrub bya sgrub mi byed/_/grub na'ang de bzhin blo nyid kyang /_/rang bzhin med par ces [#]mi 'gyur/_/so sor brtags pa'i 'gog la sogs/_/ji ste byed rgyur kun brtags pa/_/de dgag
[\[261a.4\]]pa la ji ltar blo/_/chos can nyid du brtags [#]par bya/_/phyi dang gtso bo la sogs pas/_/de la bskyed bya nyid bkag kyang /_/phyi rol la sogs stong pa nyid/_/ji ltar gcig tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/'on te thog ma med pa yi/_/rang gi sa bon las byung ba/_/rnam rtog mthar gtugs
[\[261a.5\]]blo la yod/_/chos can la brten gtso sogs 'gog_/phyi rol bzhin du phyi rol sogs/_/tha dad med bzhin de la rtog_/gcig dang du ma dben pa dang /_/nus pa med pa bzhin du mthong /_/shin tu dngos med de grub na/_/phyi rol la sogs stong nyid 'grub/_/bsgrub par bya dang
[\[261a.6\]]sgrub byed pa/_/gzhi gcig pa yang yod pa yin/_/phyi rol la sogs kun brtags pa'i/_/rang bzhin de ni rab tu 'gog_/de nyid dgag par bya ba'i phyir/_/sgrub pa la sogs byed pa min/_/rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i/_/tha snyad thams cad der brten te/_/don dam
[\[261a.7\]]nyid la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/rigs pa smra ba rnams kyis byas/_/ji ste brdzun pa kun brtags pa'i/_/chos can la yang tha snyad 'di/_/'dod na ci phyir nged cag la/_/chos can ma grub la sogs rgol/_/ji ltar khyod kyi blo la yod/_/chos can dngos po med yin yang /_/gtso bo la
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sogs brtags pa rnams/_/rab tu 'gog par byed pa la/_/gzhi ma grub pa nyid skyon du/_/'gal ba med pas mi 'gyur na/_/de bzhin nged kyang gzugs sgra dang /_/ro la sogs pa'i grags pa la/_/sgyu ma rmi lam dang mtshungs par/_/shes par byed par 'dod pa yin[#]/_/_
[\[261b.2\]]brtags pa la sogs sgro btags pa'i/_/dngos po'i chos ni 'gog byed la/_/dngos po'i ngo bo rnams [#]bkag kyang /_/ji ltar brtags pa'i chos can dag_/snang ba'i phyir na ma grub min/_/gzugs la sogs pa'ang de bzhin ltos/_/de la'ang mi dmigs la sogs pa/_/ji
[\[261b.3\]]ltar khyed ni bsgrub par 'dod/_/nged kyang de bzhin 'dir yin te/_/ji ltar srid par sgrub par byed/_/yang dag nyid du chos rnams ni/_/skye ba med kyang tha snyad du/_/'bras bu'ang [#]rang bzhin med dam ci/_/gang gis de gnyis med par gyur/_/yang dag kho na'i 'bras bu dang /_/rang
[\[261b.4\]]bzhin gyi [#]ni gtan tshigs kyis/_/bya ba yin zhes bya ba 'dir/_/'grel pa 'ga' yang grub pa med/_/gzugs brnyan brdzun pa yin yang na[#]/_/'bras bu'i gtan tshigs cir mi 'dod/_/kun du brtags pa nyid brdzun gyi/_/rang bzhin ji ste sgrub byed min/_/brtags la mi dmigs pa
[\[261b.5\]]yi chos/_/slob dpon gyis ci ma smras sam/_/de bzhin 'dir yang ci 'dod par/_/bkod pa'i dbye bas gtan tshigs gyur/_/rang bzhin kho na'i nang du ni/_/gang phyir gtan tshigs thams cad 'dus/_/sbyong ba dgod pa'i bye brag gis/_/de ni rab tu spros par zad/_/phyogs
[\[261b.6\]]kyi chos yin de'i cha yis/_/khyab par gyur pa kho na ni/_/gtan tshigs mtshan nyid mdor yin te/_/de bas mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/_/chos rnams ma lus bdag med nyid/_/sgrub [#]par byed phyir de rgyas par/_/mi 'khrul pa yi gtan tshigs dag_/ji ltar rigs pas
[\[261b.7\]]phyis 'dir bshad/_/phyin ci log gi blo rnams kyi/_/dmigs pa yang dag mthong yin nam/_/yang dag don ni grub bya'i phyir/_/tshad ma rjod par byed dam ci/_/dang po re zhig ma nges te/_/'gal ba dag kyang mthong ba yin/_/rab rib can gyis [#]skra la sogs/_/mthong ba bden par gyur pa
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]med/_/gnyis pa yang ni tshad ma dang /_/lung las grub pa ma yin no/_/chos rnams ma mthong gang yin pa/_/yang dag shes par bstan ma thag_/mngon sum las ni grub pa yi/_/dngos po med ces nyer bstan zin/_/des na dngos po'i yang dag pa/_/dmigs
[\[262a.2\]]par grub pa ma yin no/_/gcig la gcig ni stong pa nyid/_/tha snyad yin gyis yang dag pa/_/ma yin zhes pa de yi phyir/_/dngos po thams cad mkhyen mi 'grub/_/khyab bya khyab byed dngos la sogs/_/tha snyad la ni shin tu 'grub/_/don dam pa la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/mkhas
[\[262a.3\]]pa de la rten [#]mi byed/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos la sogs/_/ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'dod/_/chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo la/_/khyab par byed pa yang dag min/_/yang dag nyid du de log na/_/sgyu ma la sogs ltar brtags par/_/dngos po rnams kyi don dam pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid
[\[262a.4\]]ni ldog par 'gyur/_/'brel pa shin tu grub bya'i [#]phyir/_/mngon sum ji ste 'dod na ni/_/de yang mtshan nyid ma 'khrul pa/_/rjes su dpag pa ji ltar gsal/_/de dag nyid las 'brel pa rnyed/_/de nyid ji ste sel na ni/_/rtsa ba med phyir rang de yang /_/med pas tshad ma med par 'gyur/_/_
[\[262a.5\]]mthong ba la sogs tha snyad kyi/_/de yi ngo bo mi 'gog phyir/_/mngon sum nyid ni sel ba min/_/brtags pa dag ni 'gog par byed/_/kun rdzob don ni mi slu'i [#]phyir/_/de ni 'khrul pa med par bshad/_/yang dag ma mthong mngon sum ni/_/yang dag yul la ma 'khrul med/_/gang la ma 'khrul
[\[262a.6\]]de sel min/_/gang du sel ba der de min/_/ma 'khrul don ni gzhan yin la/_/ji ltar de ni rab tu sel/_/rjes dpag 'brel pa mngon sum las/_/yang dag don du thob pa med/_/kun rdzob sgo nas 'di thob pa/_/de la rjes [#]ni sel ba min/_/tha snyad sgo nas de dag la/_/'brel pa thob nas yang
[\[262a.7\]]dag par/_/brtags pa'i dngos po sel byed na/_/rmongs pas [#]ci zhig brtsad du yod/_/gang yang 'brel pa mngon sum las/_/thob nas thob pa'i gnas dag kyang /_/de la de yis sel na yang /_/sel bar 'dod de ci zhig gnod/_/'di ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi chos/_/rnam par brtags pa
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]thams cad ni/_/yang dag rnam 'byed ye shes kyi/_/me yi shing du gyur par 'dod/_/shing las byung ba'i me bzhin du/_/log pa'i shing de rab bsregs nas/_/rab 'byor 'bar bar [#]bzhin/_/rnam rtog zhi ba thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir shing gnyis rul [#]pa las/_/byung ba'i me yi dpe dag gis/_/_
[\[262b.2\]]yang dag so sor rtogs pa yi/_/'bras bu chen por thub pas gsungs/_/rtsa ba med pa de yi phyir/_/ji ste yang dag shes pa yi/_/rjes su dpag pa rnam rtog 'di/_/phyis ldog gyur na grub pa sgrub/_/mngon sum rtsa ba tha snyad du'ang /_/ji ste med pa yin na ni/_/de tshe rjes su dpag pa yi/_/_
[\[262b.3\]]'brel pa de las ji ltar rnyed/_/tha snyad du'ang 'di dag rnams/_/med pa nyid du thal 'gyur pa/_/mngon sum sel ba'ang 'di la ni/_/nus pa'i rgyu ni ci zhig yod/_/rgol dang slar rgol gang yin pa'i/_/rtsod pa'i gnas su rab gyur pa/_/de la bsgrub [#]bya grub bya'i phyir/_/chos rnams ma
[\[262b.4\]]lus bdag med la/_/ji ste rtsod par gyur na yang /_/'on kyang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i/_/dpe nyid sgrub byed de la yod/_/ci ste sgyu ma la sogs pa'ang /_/dngos po nyid du yod dogs na/_/nam mkha'i me tog la sogs dang /_/mo gsham bu yang ci mi snyed[#]/_/gang du shes pa cung zad 'ga'/_/_
[\[262b.5\]]nges par 'khrul pa 'dod bya dgos/_/de lta min na 'ga' yang ni/_/gang du'ang bslus pa med par 'gyur/_/thams cad dngos med bsgrub bya'i [#]phyir/_/de la snang ba'i ngo bo gang /_/brdzun pa nyid du 'dod pa dag_/de dag kho na dper byed do/_/nyi tshe ba yi rtsod pa la'ang /_/de la dngos 'dzin
[\[262b.6\]]ldog pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar bstan pa kho na bzhin/_/dper ni thams cad grub [#]pa yin/_/sgrub par byed pa 'khrul pas na/_/pha rol po yi 'dod pa'i don/_/sel bar byed do ji ltar na/_/mi 'dod thal bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rmi lam la sogs dpe 'grub cing /_/ji ltar nges la gtan tshigs
[\[262b.7\]]kyis/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed la khyab pa/_/de ltar dngos por smra la min/_/phyogs su gcig pa'i [#]dngos nyid dam/_/thams cad dngos por sgrub na yang /_/dngos por smra ba rnams la ni/_/gnyi gar grub pa'i dpe yod min/_/bdag med skad cig la sogs pa/_/sgrub pa la yang med
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dam ci/_/rgol te ngan pa nyi tshe yis/_/nged la bya ba ci zhig yod/_/dngos yod dngos med gnyi ga yi/_/chos ni yod pa bsgrub pa la/_/ma grub la sogs skyon sgo nas/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis sun dbyung smras/_/mi 'khrul ba yi sgo dag nas/_/khyab byed la sogs
[\[263a.2\]]bkag pa yis/_/dngos po med chos cir bsgrub na/_/de la ma 'brel ci zhig yod/_/yod pa yin na dngos med par/_/re zhig sgrub par nus pa med/_/brdzun de [#]bsgrub par mi bya na'ang /_/gang du rab tu bsgrub par bya/_/mi sgrub na yang gzhan dag gis/_/de la bdag sogs brtags pa
[\[263a.3\]]yis/_/dngos po dgag pa khyed cag gi/_/tshad ma med pa ji ltar 'grub/_/dngos po'i bdag nyid yang dag gang /_/'ga' yang gang du ma grub na[#]/_/gang gis de ni rgyur brjod pa'i/_/dngos po'i chos ni ga la [#]yod/_/dngos po grub pa ma yin na/_/dngos po med pa'ang 'ga' mi
[\[263a.4\]]'grub/_/dngos po gzhan du gyur pa nyid/_/dngos med mtshan ma [#]smra gzhan [#]min/_/de yi chos kyang mi 'grub cing /_/gnyis la brten pa'ang yod pa min/_/gnyis la grub pa de yi phyir/_/gnyis min gtan tshigs srid pa'ang med/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam bral chos/_/rmi lam la
[\[263a.5\]]sogs bzhin du snang /_/de [#]phyir chos kun de dag gis/_/rang dang mthun pa sgrub byed yin/_/ji ltar bdag sogs dngos med nyid/_/nus dang bral ba la sogs pas/_/khyed cag rnams kyis sgrub par byed/_/nged kyis [#]'ang de bzhin kun du yin/_/yang dag nyid du 'dod pa yis/_/dngos por
[\[263a.6\]]'di ltar rnam gnyis te/_/rtag dang mi rtag gnyi [#]ga la'ang /_/gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yod/_/yang dag nyid du brtags pa yi/_/mi rtag pa la skye bas khyab/_/'di ltar skye med ngo bo la/_/skye dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid med/_/skye ba rnams kyi skye 'jig pa'i/_/chos nyid tshad ma las
[\[263a.7\]]grub na'ang /_/mi rtag bdag nyid grub mod kyi/_/dngos po yin zhes mi rtag ste/_/bu la sogs pa brdzun pa yang /_/skye sogs rmi lam mthong ba'i phyir/_/'jig dang skye ba'i chos nyid las[#]/_/dngos po nyid kyis khyab pa med/_/de bas mi rtag ngo bo la/_/skye bas khyab pa yin mod kyi/_/_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dngos po rnams kyis [#]yang dag nyid/_/'ga' yang 'grub pa ma yin te/_/khyab par byed pa yod pa las/_/khyab bya ma lus nges 'gyur med/_/ji ltar snang ba 'di dag la/_/khyab pa yin zhes nye bar brjod/_/yang dag nyid du skye med na/_/mi rtag rjes 'brel dngos po la/_/yang dag nyid du kun
[\[263b.2\]]brtags pa/_/de ni log [#]pa kho nar 'gyur/_/de log pa na de ldog par/_/ji ste de ltar nges med na/_/de ltar mig [#]na skye ba yi/_/mi rtag khyab par mi 'gyur ro/_/rang gzhan gnyi ga rgyu med las/_/skye ba gsal [#]ba gang yin pa/_/yang dag nyid du de dngos med/_/mo gsham bu la sogs pa
[\[263b.3\]]bzhin/_/de bzhin 'dus byas dngos po kun/_/'dir ni yang dag nyid du na/_/sgyu ma rmi lam [#]lta bu ste/_/de bas 'dus byas kun rig bya/_/grangs can la sogs de dag gis/_/rang nyid las kyi dngos po rnams/_/skye bar brtags te rgyu dag las/_/'bras bu tha dad med par 'dod/_/_
[\[263b.4\]]de ni mi rigs bdag nyid kyi/_/dngos po skyed par byed pa 'di/_/ma grub pa yi skyed byed dam/_/grub pas yin zhes rnam par brtag_/ma grub rang nyid med [#]yin na/_/de tshe gang zhig ci zhig skyed/_/mo gsham nu ma 'thung ba'i bu/_/rang gi bdag nyid skyed pa med/_/grub pa yin na'ang dbye
[\[263b.5\]]med phyir/_/bdag nyid skyed phung byed de med[#]/_/'di ltar bdag nyid grub na yang /_/de tshe des skyed ci zhig yod/_/phan pa nye bar byed na ni/_/skyed byed bskyed pa nyid du grags/_/rang gi ngo bo grub na 'di'i/_/rgyu mtshan rnam gzhag ci zhig yod/_/dngos med par yang rab smra na/_/sems
[\[263b.6\]]pa can la'ang cir [#]mi 'dod/_/bskyed bya skyed byed nyid gang gis/_/rang bzhin 'ba' zhig yin par brjod/_/sems pa can bzhin rang yod phyir/_/nang gi skye mched rnams kyang ni/_/skye ba min zhes pha rol la/_/rab tu thal don de phyir smras/_/des na sems pa can dper blangs/_/_
[\[263b.7\]]thal ba'i don ni smras pa la/_/thal don yongs su ma shes nas/_/ma grub par yang rgol bar byed/_/'gal bar rab tu brjod pa'i phyir/_/gzhan la grub pa rjes bslab ste[#]/_/thal bar bsgrub par rigs pa yin/_/rang la grub la thal byed min/_/des na de la ma grub dang /_/'gal
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]ba nyid du rgol byed pa/_/de yi mi shes sdug po yi/_/mthu yis brjod pa kho nar zad/_/'on te grub kyang bdag dngos la/_/phan par byed pa yod na yang /_/de las phan pa tha dad na/_/rang las ji ltar skye ba yin/_/'dis na phan pa'ang dus rtag tu/_/rang gi
[\[264a.2\]]bdag nyid bzhin [#]grub na/_/ji ltar de yid [#]de byed pa'i/_/rgyu mtshan der ni brjod bya dgos/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i/_/rnam par gzhag 'di ga las 'gyur/_/ji ste 'di ni dbyer med na/_/rnam grangs su ni brjod pa min/_/gsal ba'am yongs su 'gyur ba ni/_/de rnams
[\[264a.3\]]gzhag pa'i rgyu yin na'ang /_/de las de gnyis tha dad na/_/rang las skye bar rigs pa min/_/tha mi dad pa nyid yin na'ang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'ang 'chol bar 'gyur/_/gsal dang mi gsal la sogs chos/_/'gal ba dus gcig ji ltar rung /_/cha shas tha dad yod na yang /_/gcig [#]la
[\[264a.4\]]cha shas ga la yod/_/tha dad tha dad mi 'gal ba/_/dngos po gcig la ji ltar rung /_/dngos po gcig ni dgag na yang /_/gnyis pa sgrub pa med par byed/_/des na gnyis min phyogs la yang /_/dngos po [#]brtag par mi bya'o/_/sngon gyi ngo bo ma bor bar/_/de ni [#]gsal ba [#]yongs
[\[264a.5\]]'gyur bar/_/ji ste 'gyur na gnas skabs rnams/_/thams cad du yang 'dres par 'gyur/_/bum pa la sogs snang ba yang /_/mi snang 'gyur zhing byis sogs la/_/rgan pa'ang dmigs 'gyur snga ma bzhin/_/rtag tu gnyi ga yod par 'gyur/_/ji ste 'gal ba'i chos rnams kyang /_/_
[\[264a.6\]]gcig tu 'dod na de yi tshe/_/sems can las la gtso bo dang /_/mi rnams tha dad ji ltar 'gyur/_/de ltar gcig tu 'dod pa yang /_/ji ste bzlog par mi bya na/_/cig car skye dang thar la sogs/_/khyed kyi kun 'gyur min nam ci/_/ji ste phyi nas bor na ni/_/rang las skye ba nyams par
[\[264a.7\]]'gyur/_/sngon por ba las tha dad phyir/_/rtag tu de nyid gsal ba yin/_/yul dang dus la sogs pa yi/_/gnas skabs nges pa 'di snang na/_/rang nyid las ni skye ba yi/_/dngos la gtan tshigs ci zhig yod/_/ltos pa med phyir phom ril du/_/rtag tu gsal ba med par 'gyur/_/rgyu
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]gzhan la ni ltos nas ni/_/rtag tu dngos po thams cad ni/_/rang gi dngos la [#]gnas pas na/_/rtag par gnas phyir skye don med/_/gsal dang yongs su 'gyur ba med/_/rtag rnams ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir/_/gsal dang yongs su 'gyur ba med/_/dngos po ma brtags [#]pa rnams
[\[264b.2\]]ni/_/shin tu gnas pa med pa yin/_/de nyid dang ni gzhan nyid dag_/phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i phyir/_/yongs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyur pa/_/de ni de yin ji ltar 'gyur/_/gsal bar gzhan du 'gyur ba [#]yang /_/rtag par gyur pa yin par brjod/_/'gal ba'i chos dang 'dres
[\[264b.3\]]gyur par[#]/_/'dir yang 'jig pa bzhin du 'gyur/_/gang zhig phyi nas byung ba'i chos/_/dngos po de ni gzhan min nam/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi dngos po de/_/de yi ming du ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ste chos de snga na yod/_/ci yi phyir na de mi snang /_/ci ste mi snang ngo bo 'di/_/phyi nas ci phyir
[\[264b.4\]]'di snang yin/_/sgrib [#]na'ang snang shar de yi tshe/_/'o ma la zho cis ma mthong /_/de ni rnam par 'dres par ltos/_/zho las tha dad ma yin phyir/_/'o ma'ang bsgribs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/phyi nas zho la sgrib pa yang /_/snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur/_/de bas gsal dang 'gyur sgo
[\[264b.5\]]nas/_/rang la skye bar pha rol pos/_/brtag [#]pa gang de dag gi/_/rmongs pa chen po'i rlom pa yin/_/gzhan las kyang ni dngos po rnams/_/yang dag skye bar rigs min te/_/gzhan las 'gyur na rtag pa'am/_/mi rtag pa las de 'gyur grang /_/rim dang cig car 'jug pa
[\[264b.6\]]yis/_/rtag pa skyed par byed pa med/_/de bas dngos rnams [#]skye med pa/_/mkha' yi me tog sogs bzhin rigs/_/rtag par rang nyid nus na yang /_/de ni gzhan la ci phyir ltos/_/byar med pa ni 'di yin na/_/gzhan la ltos pa gang yang med/_/de bas 'di ni ltos med phyir/_/_
[\[264b.7\]]rim gyis skyed par byed mi rigs/_/rgyu rnams ma tshang med pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu skye ba'am rigs mi dmigs/_/thams cad cig car skyed [#]nas ni/_/ji ste phyi nas mi skyed na/_/phyi ma bzhin du nus med phyir/_/sngar yang skyed pa ma yin 'gyur/_/rang las med pa'i nus
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]pa yi/_/rang gi ngo bo rjes 'brang na/_/snga ma bzhin du skyed byed pa/_/rtag par 'gyur gyi ldog mi 'gyur/_/tha snyad du yang nus med phyir/_/de bas rtag pa'i dngos don med/_/dngos po de yi mtshan nyid ni/_/nus pa yin zhes mkhas pa smra/_/mi rtag pa yang
[\[265a.2\]]zhig pa las/_/med phyir dngos po skye mi rigs/_/yod pa las kyang mi rigs te/_/'das pa rnams [#]yang yod pa min/_/byed pa zhig phyir de yin na'ang /_/'das pa rang gi dngos po med/_/gzhan dag zhig par gyur pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dag 'das par ji ltar rigs/_/ji ste
[\[265a.3\]]byis [#]pa gzhan zhig pas/_/byed pa'ang 'jig par 'gyur na ni/_/gnas pa med pa yin pa'i phyir/_/byed pa rnams la mtha' med 'gyur/_/'on te byed pa rang kho na/_/zhig pa nyid du rtog [#]na ni/_/dngos po rnams kyang de bzhin du/_/rnam par 'jig par cir mi 'gyur/_/tha dad na ni dngos
[\[265a.4\]]po dang /_/byed par 'brel pa mi gnyis 'grub[#]/_/gcig pa yin na byed pa bzhin/_/dngos po rang nyid zhig par yod/_/byed pa'ang 'das pa nyid yod par/_/dngos po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur/_/byed pa brjod du med yin na'ang /_/brtag [#]par 'gyur gyi yang dag min/_/ma 'ongs ma zhig pa las
[\[265a.5\]]kyang /_/'bras bu skye bar mi rigs te/_/de yi rang bzhin ma thob phyir/_/mo gsham bu las ji bzhin no/_/ji ltar dngos po'i zhig pa nyid/_/byed pa'i dbang gis mi rigs pa/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs dngos po yang /_/de yi dbang gis rtag tu med/_/de [#]ltar las kyang 'bras min te/_/dus gcig
[\[265a.6\]]rnam par rtog na ni/_/rgyu bzhin yongs su grub pa'i phyir/_/de lta min na dus gcig min/_/tha dad dus kyang 'bras bu ni/_/ji ste ma 'ongs pa nas [#]snga/_/de tshe de ltar mi rigs par/_/de ni snga rol nye bar bstan/_/skad cig gzhan gyis bar bcad nas/_/phyi nas 'byung na'ang de yi tshe/_/_
[\[265a.7\]]'das pa dag las de 'byung bas/_/de yang sngar bsal zin pa yin/_/'on te bar ni ma chod par/_/'bras bu 'byung na de yi tshe/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyi ga yang /_/dus gcig kho nar 'gyur ba yin/_/'on te'ang skad cig nyid kyis na/_/'bras bu'i dus na rgyu mi gnas/_/cig car 'gyur
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bar thal bar ni/_/de phyir rigs pa ma yin te/_/'jig dang skye ba dus mnyam pa/_/srang mda'i mtho [#]dman bzhin du yin/_/des na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/_/dus gcig nyid du 'gyur ba med/_/ji ltar chu bo drag po'i [#]rgyun/_/gang tshe chu gzhan [#]nus pa na/_/de tshe chu gzhan 'bab
[\[265b.2\]]pa yin/_/de bzhin 'jig dang skye bus [#]mnyam/_/gang tshe rang gi snga ma 'dor/_/de tshe cig shos 'ong ba yin/_/ji ltar grib mas nyi ma'i yul/_/sel ba'i dngos po'i gnas skabs dang /_/dngos dang bar dag ma chod par/_/'jig par ji ltar 'gyur yang na/_/dus gcig
[\[265b.3\]]'gyur ba ma yin pa/_/de bzhin 'bras bu lta bar gyis/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi tshul/_/ma brtags par ni grub pa yin/_/ji ste 'dod rgyal 'di smra na/_/gzhan dag la ni smra la rag_/skabs 'di nyid ni yang dag pa'i/_/don la rnam par dpyad pa yin/_/zhib mor dpyod par mkhas
[\[265b.4\]]pa la/_/'dod rgyal smra bar rigs pa min/_/'di ltar bar ni ma chod par/_/'bras bu yin zhes khyed kyis brjod/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag brjod/_/rnam par dpyod na phyogs med bya/_/bar med par ni 'dod na yang /_/de tshe rgyu dang 'bras bu dag_/dus gcig 'gyur ba ma
[\[265b.5\]]gtogs par/_/gzhan du 'gyur bar yod dam ci/_/rnam par chad par byed dus de/_/thung ba'am dbus na med na ni/_/rang gi zhib mo'i mi dag gis/_/de nyid [#]tshul de rtogs te smros/_/'di ltar bdag nyid kun gyis ni/_/de gnyis ji ltar bar ma chad/_/skad cig pa rnams
[\[265b.6\]]dus gcig phyir/_/bskal pa'ang skad cig tsam du 'gyur/_/de tshe thams cad kun rdzob tu/_/'gyur ba nye bar bstan zin to/_/bar med 'jug pa'i rgyun dag la/_/dbus na gnas pa'i skad cig gi/_/bdag nyid dang ni snga ma ru/_/bar chad med pa nyid yin la/_/gang gis
[\[265b.7\]]'dod pa de nyid kyang /_/de dang 'og mar yang yin na/_/de tshe ma skyes 'das pa yi/_/skad cig rnams kyis [#]dbus gnas pa'i/_/skad cig dang ni dus gcig la[#]/_/bzlog med 'on te bdag nyid la/_/gzhan gyis [#]bar ni ma chod na/_/skad cig gcig nyid nyams par 'gyur/_/'bras bu'i
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]phyir [#]na rgyu med phyir/_/med dang lhan cig thams cad du/_/bar ma chod pa'i bsam pa nyid/_/mi rigs snyam du sems na yang /_/khyed kyis de ni mi rigs te/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis bar na/_/dus gzhan yod par mi 'dod na/_/de tshe med pa de mi
[\[266a.2\]]rung /_/de gnyis bar ni ma chod par/_/khyed cag mngon mi 'dod na'ang /_/rgyu dang bar med 'bras bu zhes/_/rmongs te ci zhig rjod [#]par byed/_/reg dang bar ni ma chod dang /_/mjug thogs dang ni bar med pa/_/rnam grangs yin te nam du yang /_/don gyi dbye ba 'ga' yang med/_/_
[\[266a.3\]]bar med yin par mngon 'dod na'ang /_/de ci bdag nyid kun gyis sam/_/de nyid [#]phyogs gcig gis 'dod ces/_/de tshe bsam par mi 'gyur ram/_/gnyi ga'ang skyon 'dir 'gyur ba ni/_/sngar ni nye bar bstan zin to/_/rnam pa gnyis la ma gtogs par/_/bar med tshul
[\[266a.4\]]ni yod pa min/_/rgyu dang ma chod par yod pa/_/'bras bu yin zhes nyer brjod la/_/de yang bar chad med par ni/_/ma yin zhes pa dge bar gsungs/_/'bras bu'i [#]tshe na rgyu med na'ang /_/de ni gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/med na da ltar ma yin phyir/_/zhig pa las ni skye bar
[\[266a.5\]]'gyur/_/yod na bar chad med la sogs/_/de tshe bsam par cir mi 'gyur/_/de lta min na ma zhig las/_/'bras bu khyed ni ji ltar 'dod/_/'bras bu skye ba'i dus na ni/_/rgyu yod 'dod pa ma yin nam/_/de yod dus na de dag ni/_/zhig pa'i phyir na gnas pa med/_/des na ma zhig pa
[\[266a.6\]]dag las/_/'bras bu yin na'ang skye ba las/_/yod pa tha dad med pa nyid/_/skye ba bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir/_/de tshe 'bras bu rgyu med 'gyur/_/de gnyis phan pa mi byed phyir/_/'bras bu bskyed [#]ces bya ba yi/_/'brel pa 'di yang 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de bas yod pa kho na la/_/'bras bu skye
[\[266a.7\]]zhes brjod pa yin/_/de yi dus na rgyu yod phyir/_/de gnyis dus ni gcig par 'gyur/_/yang dag brtags na srang mda' yi/_/dpe yang grub pa ma yin te/_/cha shas can gyi ngo bo dang /_/chung ngu bsags pa 'di mi rigs/_/gcig la 'gal ba'i las rnams ni/_/'thad pa med
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]phyir cha can med/_/cha shas med pa'i rdul phran yang /_/bsags par rung ba ma yin no/_/shes pa snang ba'i ngo bo yi/_/srang mda'i don dam nyid du na/_/lus can min na mthon dman du/_/'gyur ba ma grub rnam pa yang /_/brdzun pa'i phyir na de mi srid/_/de bzhin rgyu 'bras
[\[266b.2\]]dngos po 'di/_/kun rdzob yin par bsgrubs par gyur/_/yang dag nyid ni de ma yin/_/de bzhin dri [#]ma chung la sogs/_/yang dag par ni grub pa med/_/de dang chos ni mthun pa'i phyir/_/rgyu 'bras yang dag nyid mi 'grub/_/bdag nyid [#]kun dang phyogs gcig gis/_/bar
[\[266b.3\]]med rnam par dpyod pa na/_/phyogs gcig nyid dang cha shas kyi/_/skyon 'gyur 'dir yang mtshungs pa yin/_/dngos ma grub na dngos med pa'ang /_/gang du 'ga' yang grub pa med/_/des na zhig pa'i dpe dag ni/_/de sgrub pa la mi rigs so/_/'di la yang ni de bzhin du/_/bar
[\[266b.4\]]chad med pa dpyad na ni/_/dus gcig nyid dang cha shas bcas/_/thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog tu med/_/skad cig ma las ring du 'di/_/dngos med nyi tshe zad yin gyi/_/'di dang bar ni med pa 'di/_/zhig ces bya ba gang yin med/_/des na bar chad med sogs 'dir/_/de bzhin bsam
[\[266b.5\]]pa 'jug pa med/_/bar ma chod par 'bras bu dag_/yod na bsam par rigs pa min/_/des na 'di la gzhan dag las/_/skye mi rigs zhes gnod byed pa/_/gzhan phyir zhes pa yod pa bzhin/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis [#]gtan tshigs rigs/_/gang du bsgrub par 'dod pa la/_/_
[\[266b.6\]]mi mthun phyogs la gnod byed med/_/de dag la ni gzhan nyid kyis/_/glen pa la sogs sgrub mi nus/_/skye ba dgag par bsgrub bya la/_/mi mthun phyogs la gnod byed pa/_/ji skad smos bzhin yod pa nyid/_/'dir ldog pa la the tshom med/_/gzhan nyid la sogs sgra rnams
[\[266b.7\]]ni/_/gang dag dngos po'i rgyu rkyen 'dod/_/de la sun 'byin smras pa ni/_/dngos po rnams kyi zhes sogs yin/_/sgra de'i don ni brtags yin yang /_/dngos po'i mthar thug gang dag 'dod/_/de la rgyu mtshan bdun pa yis/_/skye don nyes pa rig par bya/_/gzhan du gyur pa yod
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa yi/_/rkyen la don dam nyid du na/_/rigs pa min te ji skad du/_/rgyas par de bzhin bstan pa yin/_/gang tshe dngos po thams cad ni/_/yang dag nyid du skye med na/_/de tshe sgra de'i mthar thug pa/_/gzhan nyid 'grub pa ma yin no/_/gtso bo dbang phyug bcas
[\[267a.2\]]sogs las/_/dngos rnams skye ba brjod pa'i phyir/_/gnyis las skye bar 'dod par ni/_/gang dag rnam par mi mkhas par[#]/_/gang dag res [#]'ga' rnam gnyis sam/_/gcig gi ngo bor rtog pa ni/_/so sor mos pa'i nyes pa yis/_/de dang gzhan kun sun phyung zin/_/kha
[\[267a.3\]]cig tsher ma la sogs pa'i/_/rno sogs dpe ni 'ba' zhig gis/_/skye ba thams cad yang dag par/_/rgyu med kho nar rnam smra ba/_/skye ba yang dag sgrub pa la/_/dpe ni rab tu ma grub po/_/kun rdzob tu yang khas len na/_/'di ltar mngon sum la sogs 'gal/_/rjes su
[\[267a.4\]]dpag dang ldog par ni/_/mngon sum dag gis rnam nges pa/_/sa bon sogs las myu gu sogs/_/skye ba'i mngon sum zhes pa gnod/_/gang phyir rang gi sa bon las/_/tsher ma la sogs skye ba nyid/_/rno sogs de nyid las yin pas/_/des na dpe ni grub pa med/_/de dag res
[\[267a.5\]]'ga' kha cig tu/_/'byung ba [#]yongs su nges pa ni/_/ltos dang bcas par skye ba ste/_/ltos bya de dag rgyur 'dod do/_/rgyu ni phan par byed pa ste/_/phan pa med pa ltos bya min/_/phan pa med la brten na ni/_/res 'ga' ba dag rigs [#]pa min/_/rgyu la nges pa yod pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu
[\[267a.6\]]nges par 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyu med na ni ci yi phyir/_/tsher med la sogs rno sogs nges/_/dngos po rnams ni rgyu med par/_/nges par skyed par 'dod pa yis/_/khyod ni gtan tshigs sbyor byed pa/_/don med kho nar 'gyur ba yin/_/de bas rgyu med smra ba 'di/_/mngon sum la sogs
[\[267a.7\]]tshad ma yis/_/kun rdzob tu yang 'gal ba yin/_/de phyir mkhas pa rnams kyis spang /_/dngos po ji ltar grags pa yi/_/rgyu la sogs pa mi 'gog phyir/_/des ni skye ba mi smra la/_/mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba med/_/mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir/_/de phyir
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gtan tshigs ma grub med/_/'gal med ma nges 'di yang med/_/gang phyir tshul ni gzhan med la/_/bdag dang gzhan smras dngos po yi/_/brag ni ma lus gzhom pa'i phyir/_/bzhi char phyir ni [#]mi ldog pa'ang /_/rdo rje phra mo de 'di yin/_/rang gi dngos po yang dag pa/_/rtag pa'i
[\[267b.2\]]ngo bo'ang gang na [#]med/_/de ni nus pas stong pa'i phyir/_/kun tu rta yi rwa bzhin no/_/nus pa thams cad stong pa nyid/_/de ni gong du bstan pa yin/_/nus med dngos po yin na ni/_/mkha' yi me tog kyang der 'gyur/_/nus pa dag dang bral ba las/_/dngos med mtshan nyid gzhan yod
[\[267b.3\]]min/_/nam mkha'i me tog la sogs dang /_/rtag pa'ang yod pas de dngos min/_/ji ste dngos po kun rdzob tu'ang /_/nus dang bral bar gyur na ni/_/gzhan du 'gar ni dngos po dang /_/dngos med dbye ba 'dir mi 'gyur/_/de bas dngos po thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin med pa gang
[\[267b.4\]]yin pa/_/yang dag nyid du de rig bya/_/dri za'i grong khyer la sogs bzhin/_/gang phyir yang dag don dgag sgrub/_/mngon sum la sogs gnod pa med/_/mngon sum rjes su dpag pa yis[#]/_/dngos po grub med ces bsgrubs zin/_/skye ba sgyu ma skye ba bzhin/_/gang phyir kun rdzob nyid du
[\[267b.5\]]yong /_/de phyir 'jig rten lung dang ni/_/'gal ba 'jug pa med pa yin/_/ji ste yang dag skye ba la/_/tshad ma gnod byed yin na ni/_/sbyor ba 'dod pas 'gyur ba med/_/mngon sum gnod pa'i tshul dag gis/_/ji ste de 'dir mi sbyar na/_/'gar ni gnod par byar rung phyir/_/de tshe
[\[267b.6\]]gtan tshigs 'dir mi rung /_/snang bcas la sogs rnam shes kyis/_/ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu yi/_/yang dag gang yin mi 'grub pa/_/de bzhin kun rdzob kyang mi 'grub/_/gnod byed bya ba de 'dir ni/_/gang zhig brdzun par rtogs pa'o/_/de yis de ni 'dod nyid pas/_/mi 'dod
[\[267b.7\]]par ni bsgrubs pa med/_/de bas brdzun nyid yin pa'i phyir/_/'di ni kun rdzob yin par 'dod/_/de ni rigs par ldan yin na/_/don dam nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/gnod pa grags pa sel ce na/_/de ni [#]mi rigs [#]tshad ma yin[#]/_/gnod kyang sgyu ma la sogs pa/_/gsal ba 'jig
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]rten ma grags min/_/ji ste brdzun na 'jig rten la/_/gang du cung zad snang med pa/_/de tshe yang dag mthong ba'i phyir/_/kun gyis de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/_/tshad ma gang yang brdzun zhes pa'i/_/tha snyad byar yang med par 'gyur/_/gnod par 'jug pa ma yin la/_/_
[\[268a.2\]]gang yang nor ba med pa yin/_/'on te gnod pa 'gal yin na/_/de ni tshad mas ji ltar byed/_/de yis brjod na brjod la rag_/'dod yin de las de cir 'gyur/_/'di yis snang bar mi 'gyur na'ang /_/sngon chad de ni ji ltar yin/_/sngon chad 'di ni med na yang /_/gang la 'gal
[\[268a.3\]]ba rjod par 'gyur/_/'gal ba med pas 'gal brjod pas/_/de ni 'jigs sam ci zhig na/_/gang phyir 'gal ba brjod na ni/_/de ni 'di ru ldog pa yin/_/shes par smra bas gnyis po dag_/'gal ba nyid du brjod byas kyang /_/gnyis su med la snang gyur pa/_/ji ltar sems
[\[268a.4\]]can gsal bcas yin/_/zla ba gnyis dang mgal [#]me yi/_/'khor lo la sogs nor pa la/_/rtog ge ba yis 'gal brjod kyang /_/snang ba log par 'gyur ba'ang med/_/'on te 'di snyam brdzun pa rnams/_/'gal yang 'gal bar mi gzhag ste/_/'khrul pa de na sems la ni/_/_
[\[268a.5\]]rnam pa rnams ni snang ba yin/_/dngos po mthu yis byung ba yi/_/tshad mas rnam par 'gal bar ni/_/dngos po nyid la rjod byed kyi/_/de mi srid phyir brdzun la min/_/de lta yin na kun rdzob tu/_/skye ba la ni ci yi phyir/_/khyed kyis 'gal brjod par byed/_/'dir yang de bzhin ma byed cig/_/_
[\[268a.6\]]'jig rten grags pa kho na yin/_/don la tshad ma 'jug pa'i phyir/_/nged kyis kyang ni kha cig tu/_/gzhan du tshad mas sbyar ba [#]med/_/ji ltar grags pa'i dngos po rnams/_/gang dag nyid du khas len gang /_/de gzhung so sor dgag pa'i phyir/_/dngos po thams cad rnam par dpyad/_/_
[\[268a.7\]]de dag ji bzhin dpyad na ni/_/yang dag nyid du de mi gnas/_/de tshe brdzun par rab tu 'grub/_/thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bzhin/_/yang dag nyid kyis [#]dngos po de/_/mngon sum du ni grub pa med/_/de la tshad mas gnod na yang /_/ji ltar mngon sum gnod pa yin/_/de phyir ji ltar
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i dngos po gnas pa yin/_/mthun pa'am mi mthun pa'ang rung /_/sgyu ma bzhin du 'gal ba med/_/'dir ni skad cig ma yin sogs/_/thal bar 'gyur zhes brtsad mi rigs/_/brdzun pa [#]'di ni mi 'jug ces/_/de ni snga logs nye bar bstan/_/sgyu ma rmi
[\[268b.2\]]lam mtshungs pa yi/_/dngos la de ni mi srid phyir/_/skad cig skad cig ma yid nyid/_/brtags pa yin gyi yang dag min/_/de phyir rtags [#]sogs dngos po yi/_/gzugs la sogs la [#]lta ba ni/_/shes rab dag la spyod min gyi/_/shes rab gzugs brnyan yin zhes gsungs/_/_
[\[268b.3\]]bag med pa yi byis pa rnams/_/'du byed dag la yid dbyung phyir/_/bdag med nyid la 'jug bya'i [#]phyir/_/skad cig pa nyid bstan pa yin/_/'on te ji ste kun rdzob tu/_/dngos po skye bar 'dod na ni/_/dngos po khas blangs kho na yin/_/ming la dbye ba yod du zad/_/'di ltar ri bong rwa
[\[268b.4\]]la sogs/_/brjod du med las rnam log par/_/sa bon la sogs deng 'dod bya/_/de lta min na mthong dang 'gal/_/gang yang nus pa ma lus dang /_/bral zhing brjod du med pa las/_/rnam par log ces bya bar bgrang /_/de nyid nges kyis dngos por bgrang /_/rmi lam la sogs
[\[268b.5\]]dag na ni/_/glang po la sogs brdzun par snang /_/brjod du med las rnam log pa/_/de ci yin nam ma yin smros/_/rnam ldog ji ste dngos nyid na/_/de dag brdzun pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/ma yin na yang de yi tshe/_/de la grags gnod ji ltar spangs[#]/_/shes pa'i ngo bo dang mi mthun/_/lus
[\[268b.6\]]can rnams la snang ba'i phyir/_/shes pa'i ngo bor de dag ni/_/dngos po nyid ces byar mi rung /_/gzhan du snang ba ji ltar na/_/gzhan gyi ngo bo yin par 'gyur/_/de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i/_/ngo bo gang de nyid 'dir dpe/_/ji ste yang ni 'di snyam du/_/de dag dngos po'i bag bzhin
[\[268b.7\]]du/_/gsal bar snang ba 'on kyang ni/_/tshad mas gnod pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/_/brdzun pa kho nar snang ba'i phyir/_/dngos po'i ngo bor mi gzhag go/_/des na ri bong rwa sogs las/_/rnam ldog la sogs 'dir ni [#]bsam/_/gzhan yang de ni snang ba'i phyir/_/med las tha dad med pa min/_/_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]brdzun pa'i ngo bor snang ba'i phyir/_/tha dad par yang rigs pa min/_/de lta yin na kun rdzob dngos/_/sgyu ma sogs las dbyer med la/_/tshad mas gnod pa yin pa la'ang /_/ldog pa la sogs ji ste bsam/_/dngos dang dngos med ngo bo yi/_/rnam ldog thams
[\[269a.2\]]cad rnam 'khrul pa'i/_/rnam pa bzhin yin de dag la/_/ldog de la sogs ji ltar bsam/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid grub na/_/de phyir rnam ldog nyid du 'gyur/_/tshad mas gnod pa yin pa'i phyir/_/de ma grub ces sngar bstan zin/_/rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa yi/_/mthu las
[\[269a.3\]]so sor snang ba'i phyir/_/rnam mi ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/gcig tu de [#]phyir yod pa min/_/rgyu dang rkyen nyid tshogs pa la/_/sgyu ma la sogs ltos gyur kyang /_/de tsam gyis ni dngos nyid du/_/de la yongs su brtag mi rigs/_/ji ltar grags pa'i dngos po rnams/_/de ni ltos dang byas pas [# ]
[\[269a.4\]]bshad/_/yang dag nyid min ji ltar sngar/_/rgyas par rab tu bsgrubs pa yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang [#]/_/kun rdzob tu ni rab grub phyir/_/de ni ji ltar grub yin zhes/_/rnam par dpyad pa 'dir mi rigs/_/tha snyad byed pa rnams kyis ni/_/ji ltar grags pa'i dngos po'i don/_/_
[\[269a.5\]]de bzhin gzung [#]bar bya ba yin/_/thar 'dod rnams kyis yang dag dpyad/_/don dam nyid du gang med pa/_/tha snyad du ni yod pa min/_/de dag med pa nyid gyur pa/_/rta yi rwa la sogs pa bzhin/_/de bzhin ji ste dngos po rnams/_/yang dag nyid du med gyur pa/_/de dag kun rdzob tu yang med/_/_
[\[269a.6\]]ce na de ni rigs ldan min/_/'di ltar bden pa'i dngos po ni/_/ldog na kun rdzob dngos po yang /_/ldog par 'gyur zhes byar ni 'dir/_/'brel pa gang yang yod pa min/_/bden dang brdzun gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir/_/de yi bdag nyid yod pa min[#]/_/de yi phyir na bden pa las/_/brdzun pa'i
[\[269a.7\]]ngo bo skye ba med/_/sgyu ma la sogs dag la ni/_/bden pa'i ngo bo spangs pa snang /_/de lta min na ji ltar de/_/brdzun pa nyid du rnam par gnas/_/don dam pa yi ngo bo nyid/_/spangs pa nyid ni kun rdzob kyi/_/dngos po'i ngo bor 'dod yin na/_/ji ltar de med na de med/_/ji ste don dam par yod kyis/_/_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]ji ste kun rdzob de med na/_/de bzhin kun gyis [#]yang dag mthong /_/kun rdzob rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang yang ri bong rwa la sogs/_/kun rdzob tu yang mi skye ba/_/de ni de 'dra'i sa la sogs/_/tshogs pa med pa kho nas yin/_/rgyu tshogs yod pa ma yin na/_/sgyu ma yang ni 'byung
[\[269b.2\]]mi 'gyur/_/de yod na ni 'di 'byung ba'i/_/dngos po nyid ni kun rdzob yin/_/dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/_/med par mthun na ji ltar 'gar[#]/_/res 'ga' kha cig skye bar 'gyur/_/kun du thams cad ji ste min/_/rab rib dag gis 'khrugs pa'i mig_/mthun pa dag la brdzun
[\[269b.3\]]snang na/_/skra sogs so sor snang ba yang /_/nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig yod/_/de la rab rib rgyu yin na'ang /_/de ni brdzun du ji ltar 'gyur/_/dngos po med la khyed cag ni/_/rgyu rnams yod par 'gar mi 'dod/_/sgra la sogs pa brdzun pa la'ang /_/ji ste nges pa'i rgyu yod par/_/brjod
